anya-e1201n:11_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti, a ā i ī u ū e ऐ o औ ka
anya-e1201n:11_1: kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma
anya-e1201n:11_2: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ; tena kvattho “ñonama vaṇṇe“. titālīsāti vacanaṃ katthavi
anya-e1201n:13: Tatthādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti; tena kvattho “saro lopo sare“. ccādi.
anya-e1201n:15: Tesu dvedve sarā savaṇṇā nāma honti; tena kvattho “vaṇṇapareṇa savaṇṇopi“
anya-e1201n:18: Tesu dvīsu yo yo pubbo so so rassasañño hoti; tesu e o saṃyogato pubbāva dissanti; tena kvattho “rasso ve“.ccādi.
anya-e1201n:20: Tesveva dvīsu yo yo paro so so dīghasañño hoti; tena kvattho’yolopanisu dīgho“.ccādi.
anya-e1201n:22: Kakārādayo vaṇṇā niggahītapariyantā byajanasaññā honti; tena kvattho “byajane dīgharassā“.ccādi.
anya-e1201n:24: Kādayo pañcakā pañca vaggā nāma hontī; tena kvattho “vagge vagganto“. ccādi.
anya-e1201n:26: Yvāyaṃ vaṇṇe bindumatto so niggahītasañño hoti; tena kvattho “niggahītami“. ccādi; garusaññā karaṇaṃ anvatthasaññatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:28: Nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ tassa ante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṃ; tena kvattho“jhalā ve“. Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:30: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamānā ivaṇṇu vaṇṇā pasaññā honti; tena kvatthā “ye passivaṇṇassa“. Iccādi.
anya-e1201n:32: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamāno ākāro ghasañeññā hoti; tena kvattho “ghabrahmādite“.Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:34: Ālapane si gasañño hoti; tena kvattho “ge ve“.Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:37: Yaṃ visesanaṃ tadantassa vidhi ñātabbo; “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe“. Narā nare.
anya-e1201n:39: Sattamīniddese pubbasseva kāriyaṃ ñatabbaṃ; “saro lopo sare“. Veḷaggaṃ; tamahantīdha kasmā na hoti; saretopasilesikādhāro tatthetāva vuccate pubbasseva hoti na parassāti.
anya-e1201n:41: Pañcamīniddese parassa kāriyaṃ ñatabbaṃ; “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe“. Narā nare; idha na hoti jantuyo anantā; idha kasmā na hoti; osadhyo anantare katatthatāya na vyava hitassa kāriyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:43: Parassa sissamānaṃ kāriyamādivaṇṇassa ñātabbaṃ; “ra saṅkhyāto vā“. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:45: Chaṭṭhiniddiṭṭhassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ tadantassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyaṃ “rājassi nāmhi“. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:49: Ṭakāro’nubandho yassa so’nekakkharo cādeso sabbassa hoti; “imassānitthiyaṃ ṭe“. Esu “nāmhanimi“. Anena.
anya-e1201n:51: Chaṭṭhiniddiṭṭhassa ñānubandhakānubandhā ādyantā honti; “bruto tissīña“. Bravīti, “bhussa vuka“. Babhuva.
anya-e1201n:53: Makāro’nubandho yassa so sarānamantā sarā paro hotī; “mañca rudhādīnaṃ“. Rundhati.
anya-e1201n:55: Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānaṃ sahappattiyaṃ paro; so ca gacchati tvañca gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha; so ca gacchati tvañca gacchasi ahañca gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma.
anya-e1201n:57_0: Yo’navayavabhuto saṅketo so’nubandhoti ñatabbo;latupitādīnamāsimhi. Kattā, saṅketaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1201n:57_1: kiṃ? Pakatīyādisamudāyassānubandhatā mā hotuti; anavayavo hi samudāyo samudāyarūpattāyeva;
anya-e1201n:57_2: anavayavaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ?’Atena’. Janena; imināva lopassāvagatattā nānubandhalopāya vacanamāraddhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:59: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā tena savaṇṇo’pi gayhati saṃva rūpaṃ; yuvaṇṇānamño luttā“. Vāteritaṃ, samonā.
anya-e1201n:61: Vantvādisambandhiyeva ntu gayhati, “ntantunaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame“. Guṇavanto; vantvādisambandhīti kiṃ; jantu tantu.
anya-e1201n:64: Sare saro lopanīyo hoti; tatrime, saddhindriyaṃ, no hetaṃ, bhikkhunovādo, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṃ, puttā matthi, asantettha.
anya-e1201n:65: Paro kvaci lopanīyo hoti; so’pi, sāva, yatodakaṃ, tatova; kvavīti kiṃ? Saddhinduyaṃ ayamadhikāro āparicchedāvasānā tena nātippasaṅgo.
anya-e1201n:67: Pubbaparasarā dve’pi vā kvaci na lupyante; latā iva lateva latāva.
anya-e1201n:69_0: Luttā sarā paresaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ño honti vā yathākkamaṃ; tassedaṃ, vāteritaṃ, nopeti,
anya-e1201n:69_1: vāmoru, ateva’ññe, vodakaṃ; kathaṃ paccorasmanti; yogavibhagā, vātveva tassidaṃ;
anya-e1201n:71: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārā hontiva yathākkamaṃ; vyākato, iccassa, ajjhiṇamutto, svāgataṃ, bhavāpanalānīlaṃ; vāttheva-itissa; kvacītveva-yānīdha, sūpaṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1201n:73: Ñonaṃ yavā honti vā sare yathākkamaṃ; tyajja te’jja svāhaṃ so’haṃ,kvacitveva-puttāmatthi asantettha.
anya-e1201n:75: Sare gossa avaṅi hoti; gavāssaṃ; yathariva tatharivetinipātāva; bhusāmiveti ivasaddo evattho.
anya-e1201n:77: Rassadīghānaṃ kvaci dīgharassā honti byañjane; tatrāyaṃ, munīvare, sammadeva, mālahārī.
anya-e1201n:79: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpā honti; paggaho; saramhāti-kiṃ? Taṃkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:81: Catutthadutiyesu paresvesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsattya; mahaddhano, yasa tthero, apphuṭaṃ, abbhuggato; esviti-kiṃ? Thero; esantikiṃ?Pattho.
anya-e1201n:83: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā; ittheva icceva; eveti-kiṃ,iccāha.
anya-e1201n:85_0: Ñonaṃ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā; disvā yācakamāgate, akarambhasate,esaattho, esadhammo,
anya-e1201n:85_1: maggo aggamakkhāyati, svāyatanaṃ, hiyyattanaṃ, karassu; vātveva-yācake āgate, eso
anya-e1201n:87_0: Niggabhītamāgamo hoti vā kvaci; cakkhuṃ udapādi cakkhu udapādi, purimaṃjāti purimajāti,
anya-e1201n:87_1: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ. Avaṃ siroti-ādisu niccaṃ vavatthītavibhāsattā vādhikārassa;
anya-e1201n:87_2: sāmatthī yenāgamova sa ca rassasarasseva hoti tassa rassānugatattā.
anya-e1201n:89: Niggahītassa lopo hoti vā kvaci; kyāhaṃ kīmahaṃ, sā ratto saṃratto; sallekho-gattukāmo-gantumanotiādisu niccaṃ.
anya-e1201n:91: Niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci; tvaṃsi tvamasi.
anya-e1201n:93_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hoti paccā satyā; taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, tañcarati
anya-e1201n:93_1: taṃ carati, taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tampāti taṃ pāti; niccaṃ
anya-e1201n:95: Yaevahisaddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti; yayaññadeva, taññeva, tañbhi; vātveva-yaṃyadeva.
anya-e1201n:97: Saṃsaddassa yaṃ niggahītaṃ tassa vā ño hoti yakāre; saññamo saṃyamo.
anya-e1201n:99: Niggahītassa mayadā honti vā sare kvaci; tamahaṃ, tayidaṃ, tadalaṃ; vātveva-taṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:101_0: Ete mayadā cāgamā honti sare vā kvaci; tivaṅgīkaṃ, ito nāyati, cinitvā, tasmātiha,
anya-e1201n:101_1: nirojaṃ, puthageva, idhamāhu, yathayidaṃ, attadatthaṃ; vātveva-attatthaṃ; atippago
anya-e1201n:103: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā; chaḷahaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ; vātveva-cha abhiññā.
anya-e1201n:105_0: Tadaminādīni sādhūni bhavanti? Taṃ iminā tadaminā, sakiṃ āgāmī sakadāgāmī, ekaṃ idha
anya-e1201n:105_1: ahaṃ ekamidāhaṃ, saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidāvahāro, vārino vāhako valāhako, jīvanassa
anya-e1201n:105_2: mūto jīmūto, chavassa sayanaṃ susānaṃ, uddhaṃ khamassa udukkhalaṃ, pisi tāso pisāco,
anya-e1201n:105_3: mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro; evamaññepi payoga to’nugantabbā; paresaṃ pisodarādivedaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:107: Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ cavaggabayañā honti yathākkamaṃ yakāre; apūccaṇḍakāyaṃ, tacchaṃ, yajjevaṃ, ajjhattaṃ, thañaññaṃ, dibbaṃ, payyesanā, pokkharañño; kvacītveva-ratyā.
anya-e1201n:109: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti; sakkate, paccate, aṭṭate, kuppate, phallate, assate, kvacī tveca-kyāhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:113: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre; bavhābādho bahvā bādho.
anya-e1201n:115: Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā hontī vā; dukkaṭaṃ, aṭṭhakathā, gahaṇaṃ, paligho, palāyati, vātveca-dukkataṃ; kvacītveva-sugato.
anya-e1201n:117: Saṃyogassa yo ādibhuto’vayavo tassa vā kvacī lopo hoti; pupphaṃsā, jāyate’gini.
anya-e1201n:119_0: Vīcchāyamābhikkhaññe ca yaṃ vattate tassa dve rūpāni honti, kriyāya guṇena dabbena
anya-e1201n:119_1: vā bhinne atthe vyāpitu micchā vīcchā; rukkhaṃrukkhaṃ siñcati, gāmogāmo ramaṇīyo,
anya-e1201n:119_2: gāme gāme pānīyaṃ, gehe gehe issaro, rasaṃ rasaṃ bhakkhayatī, kiriyaṃ kiriyamārahate.
anya-e1201n:120_0: Atthiyevānupubbiye’pi vīcchā, mūle thūlā, agge agge sukhumā; yadi hi ettha mūlaggabhedo
anya-e1201n:120_1: na siyā ānupubbiyampi na bhaveyya, (jeṭṭhaṃ jeṭṭhamanuppavesaya) māsakaṃ māsakaṃ
anya-e1201n:120_2: imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ dehīti- māsakaṃ māsakamiccetasmā vīcchāvagamyate
anya-e1201n:120_3: saddantarato pana imamhā kahāpaṇāti avadhāraṇaṃ; pubbaṃ pubbaṃ pupphanti, paṭhamaṃ
anya-e1201n:120_4: paṭhamaṃ paccantīti vīcchāva; ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esaṃ dvinnamaḍḍhatā, sabbe
anya-e1201n:120_5: ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesaṃ aḍḍhatā, ihāpi vīcchāva; ābhikkhaññaṃ-ponopuññaṃ,
anya-e1201n:120_6: pacati pacati papacati papacati, lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ lunāti, bhutvā bhutvā gacchati,
anya-e1201n:122: Vīcchāmekassa dvitte pubbassa syādilopo hoti, ekekassa, kathaṃ matthakamatthakenāti? Syādilopo pubbassāti yogavibhāgā; na cātippaṅgo yogavibhāgā iṭṭhappasiddhīti.
anya-e1201n:124: Sabbādīnaṃ vītihāre dve bhavanti pubbassa syādilopo ca; aññamaññassa bhojakā, itarītarassa bhojakā.
anya-e1201n:126_0: Turitenāpāyahetupadassanaṃ sambhamo, tasmiṃ sati vattu yāvanteha saddehi so’ttho
anya-e1201n:126_1: viññāyate tāvanto saddā payujjante; sappo sappo sappo, bujjhassu bujjhassu bujjhassu,
anya-e1201n:128: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā tena nātippasaṅgo iṭṭhasiddhi ca.
anya-e1201n:131_0: Etesaṃ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā; muni munayo, muniṃ munayo,
anya-e1201n:131_1: muninā munīhi, munissa munīnaṃ, munismā munīhi, munissa munīnaṃ, munismiṃ munīsu,
anya-e1201n:131_2: evaṃ kumārī kumāriyo, kaññā kaññāyoti; etāni satta dukāni sattavibhattiyo; vibhāgo
anya-e1201n:133_0: Karīyati kattukriyāyābhīsambandhīyatīti kammaṃ, tasmiṃ dutiyā vibhatti hoti; kaṭaṃ
anya-e1201n:133_1: karoti, odanaṃ pavati, ādiccaṃ passati, odano paccatīti-odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate,
anya-e1201n:133_2: kiṃ carahi? Ākhyātato; kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ dassanīyanti- attheva guṇa yuttassa kammatā;
anya-e1201n:133_3: icchite’pi kammattāva dutiyā siddha; gāvuṃ payo dohati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ yāvati, gavamavarundhati
anya-e1201n:133_4: vajaṃ, māṇavakaṃ maggaṃ pucchati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ bhikkhate, rukkhamava cināti phalāni,
anya-e1201n:134_0: Evamanicachite’pi; ahiṃ laṅghayati, vīsaṃ bhakkheti; yanne vicchitaṃ nāpi anicchitaṃ
anya-e1201n:134_1: tatthāpi dutīyā siddhā; gāmaṃ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappati, pathaviṃ adhisessati,
anya-e1201n:135: Vatticchāto hi kārakāni honti; taṃ yathā- valāhakā vijjotate, valāhakassa vijjotate, valāhako vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotateti.
anya-e1201n:136_0: Evamabhinavisassa vā, dhammamabhinivisate dhamme vā, tathā upanvajjhāvasassābhojananavutticanassa;
anya-e1201n:136_1: gāmamupavasati, gāma manuvasati, pabbatamadhivasati, gharamāvasati; abhojananivuttivaca
anya-e1201n:136_2: nassāti-kiṃ? Gāme upavasati-bhojananivuttiṃ karotīti attho. Tappānācāre’pi kammattāva
anya-e1201n:136_3: dutiyā siddhā, nadimpivati, gāmaṃ carati; evaṃ sace maṃ nālapissatīti-ādisupi.
anya-e1201n:137_0: Vihitāva paṭiyoge dutiyā, paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgāti-taṃ paṭi bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti
anya-e1201n:137_1: attho; yadā tu dhātunā yutto pati tadā tenāyogā sambandhe chaṭṭhī ca tassa nappaṭi
anya-e1201n:137_2: bhātīti? Akkhe dibbati, akkhehi dibbati, akkhesu dibbatītikammakaraṇādhikaraṇavacanicchā.
anya-e1201n:139_0: Kriyāguṇadabbehi sākallena kāladdhānaṃ sambandho accantasaṃyoge, tasmiṃ viññāyamāne
anya-e1201n:139_1: kālasaddehi addha saddehi ca dutiyā hoti; māsamadhīte, māsaṃ kalyāṇi. Māsaṃ guḷadhānā,
anya-e1201n:139_2: kosamadhīte, kosaṃ kuṭilā nadī, kosaṃ pabbato; accantasaṃyegeti kiṃ? Māsassa dvīhamadhīte;
anya-e1201n:139_3: kosasseka dese pabbato; pubbanhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, imaṃ rattiṃ
anya-e1201n:139_4: cattāro mahārājāti; evamādisu kālavācīhi accantasaṃyegattāva dutiyā siddhā, vibhattivipallāsena vā bahulaṃ vidhānā-
anya-e1201n:140_0: Phalappattiyaṃ kriyāparisamattyapavaggo tasmiṃ viññāya māne kāladdhānaṃ kriyāyāccantasaṃyoge
anya-e1201n:140_1: tatiyābhimatā sāpi karaṇattāva siddhā; māsenānuvāko’dhīto, kosenānuvā ko’dhītoti;
anya-e1201n:140_2: anapavaggetu asādhakatamattā karaṇattābhave dutiyāva māsamadhīto’nuvāko, na cānena gahitoti.
anya-e1201n:141_0: Kārakamajjhe ye kāladdhānavācino tato sattamīpapañcamiyo abhimatā; ajja bhutvā devadatto
anya-e1201n:141_1: dvīhe bhuñjissati dvīhā bhuñjissati, atraṭṭho’yamissāso kose lakkhaṃ vijjhati, kosā
anya-e1201n:143_0: Gamanatthānaṃ bodhatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthānamakammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca payojje
anya-e1201n:143_1: kattari dutiyā hoti, sāmatthiyā ca payojakavyāpārena kammatāvassa hotīti patīyate;
anya-e1201n:143_2: gama yati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, yāpayati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, bodhayati māṇavakaṃ dhammaṃ,
anya-e1201n:143_3: vedayati māṇavakaṃ dhammaṃ, bhojayati māṇavakamodanaṃ, āsayati māṇavakamodanaṃ, ajjhāpayati
anya-e1201n:143_4: māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ pāṭhayati māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ, āsayati devadattaṃ, sāyayati deva dattaṃ,
anya-e1201n:143_5: aññaṃ bhajjāpeti, aññaṃ koṭṭāpeti, añaññaṃ santharāpeti. Etesamevāti kiṃ?Pācayati
anya-e1201n:143_6: odanaṃ devadattena yañaññadatto; paye ppoti kiṃ?Gacchati devadatto, yadā carahigamayati
anya-e1201n:143_7: devadattaṃ yañña datto, tamaparo payojayati tadā gamayati devadattaṃ yaññadatteneti
anya-e1201n:145_0: Harādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā; hāreti hāraṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā,
anya-e1201n:145_1: ajjhohāreti sattuṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā, kāreti devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā,
anya-e1201n:145_2: dassayate janaṃ rājā janeneti vā, abhivādayate guruṃ devadattaṃ devadatteneti vā.
anya-e1201n:147: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti; khādayati devadattena, ādayati devadattena, avhāpayati devadattena, saddāyati devadattena, kandayati devadattena, nāyayati devadattena.
anya-e1201n:149: Vāhayati bhāraṃ devadattena; aniyantuketi-kiṃ?Vāhayati gāraṃ balivadde.
anya-e1201n:151: Bhakkhayati modake devadattena; ahiṃsāyanti kiṃ? Bhakkhayati balivadde sassaṃ.
anya-e1201n:153: Dhiādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti? Dhiratthumaṃ pūtikāyaṃ, antarā ca rājagahaṃ, antarā ca nāḷandaṃ, samādhānamantarena, mucalindamabhito saramiccādi-chaṭṭhiyāpavādo yaṃ.
anya-e1201n:155: Lakkhaṇādisvatthesvahinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; rukkha mabhivijjetate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, rukkhaṃ rukkhamabhitiṭṭhati.
anya-e1201n:157_0: Patiparīhi yuttamhā lakkhaṇādisu bhāge vatthe dutiyā hoti; rukkhampati vijjotate
anya-e1201n:157_1: vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṃ
anya-e1201n:157_2: pati siyā, rukkhaṃ parivijjetate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pari, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ
anya-e1201n:157_3: pari tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṃ pari siyā.
anya-e1201n:159_0: Lakkhaṇādisvatthesvanunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; rukkha manuvijjotate vijju, saccakiriyamanupavassi;
anya-e1201n:159_1: hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātaramanu, rukkhaṃ rukkhamanu tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1201n:163: Hīnatthe’nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; anusāriputtaṃ paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:166: Hinatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; upasāriputta paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:168: Ādhikyatthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti; upakhārayaṃ doṇo.
anya-e1201n:170: Sāmibhāvatthe’dhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti; adhibrahmadatte pañcālā, adhipañcālesu brahmadatto.
anya-e1201n:172_0: Kattari karaṇa cैa kārake tatiyā hoti; purisena kataṃ, asinā chindati, pakatiyābhirūpo,
anya-e1201n:172_1: gottena gotamo’sumedho nāma nāmena, jātiyā sattavassikoti-bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe
anya-e1201n:172_2: eva tatiyā; evaṃ samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti, pañcakena pasavo kiṇātīti.
anya-e1201n:174: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā; puttena sahāgato, puttena saddhiṃ āgato? Tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati.
anya-e1201n:176: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā siyā; tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi, akkhinā kāṇo, tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.
anya-e1201n:178: Takkiriyāyogge tatiyā siyā; annena vasati, vijjāya yaso.
anya-e1201n:180: Iṇe hetumhī pañcamī hoti vā;jaḷattā baddho satena vā.
anya-e1201n:182: Parāṅgabhute hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā; jaḷattā baddho jaḷattena vā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvato’niccā, saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇanirodho.
anya-e1201n:184: Hetvatthavacīhi yege hetumhi chaṭhī siyayā; udarassa hetu, udarassa kāraṇā.
anya-e1201n:186_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbā vibhattiyo honti; ko hetu, kaṃ hetuṃ, kena hetunā,
anya-e1201n:186_1: tassa hetussa, kasmā hetusmā, kassa hetussa, kasmiṃ hetusmiṃ; kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, kena kāraṇena;
anya-e1201n:186_2: kiṃ nimittaṃ, kena nimittena; kiṃ payojanaṃ, kena payojaneneccevamādi –hetvatthehītveva-kena kataṃ.
anya-e1201n:188: Yassa sammā padīyate tasmiṃ catutthi siyā; saṅghassa dadāti, ādhāravicakkhāyaṃ sattamīpi siyā, saṅghe dehi.
anya-e1201n:190: Tassedaṃ tadatthaṃ tadatthabhāve jotanīye nāmasmā catutthī siyā; sītassa paṭighātāya, atthāya hitāya devamanussānaṃ, nālaṃ dārabharaṇāya, yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajatītvevamādi.
anya-e1201n:191_0: Kassa sāduṃ na ruccati, mā āyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccattha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e1201n:191_1: bhattamassa nacchādetīti-chaṭṭhī sambandha vacanicchāyaṃ; na cevaṃ virodho siyā sadisarūpattā
anya-e1201n:191_2: evaṃ vidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti-atthamatte paṭhamā.
anya-e1201n:193_0: Rañño sataṃ dhāreti, rañño chattaṃ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī; evaṃ rañño silāghate,
anya-e1201n:193_1: rañño hanute, rañño upa tiṭṭhate, rañño sapate, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, tassa
anya-e1201n:193_2: kujjha mahāvīra, yaditaṃ tassa pakuppeyyaṃ, dubhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ
anya-e1201n:193_3: na dūhatī,[ ] yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, issayanti
anya-e1201n:193_4: samaṇānaṃ titthiyā, dhammena nayamānānaṃ kā usūya, [ ] rañño bhāgyamā rajjhati, rañño
anya-e1201n:193_5: bhāgyamikkhate, tena yācito ayācito vā tassa gāvo paṭisuṇāti, gāvo āsuṇāti, bhagavato
anya-e1201n:193_6: paccassosuṃ, hotu patigiṇāti, hotvanugiṇāti, ārovayāmi vo, pativedayāmi vo, dhamma
anya-e1201n:193_7: te desissāmi, yathā no satthā vyākareyya, alaṃ te idha vāsena, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha,
anya-e1201n:193_8: arahati mallo mallassāti –jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññamanoti tādatthye catutthi; tiṇena
anya-e1201n:194: “Yo ca sitaca uṇhaca tiṇā bhiyyo na namaññati“
anya-e1201n:195_0: Tiṇamiva jīvitaṃ maññamānoti-savisayāva vibhattiyo; saggāya gacchatīti-tādatthye
anya-e1201n:195_1: catutthi, yo hi saggaṃ gacchati tadatthaṃ tassa gamananti–-kammavavanicchāyaṃ tu
anya-e1201n:195_2: dutiyāva - saggaṃ gacchati; āyuṃ bhoto hotu, ciraṃ jīvitaṃ bhaddaṃ kalyāṇaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e1201n:195_3: payojanaṃ kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ sukhaṃ sātaṃ bhoto hotu; sādhu sammuti metassa,
anya-e1201n:195_4: puttassāvikareyya guyhamatthaṃ, tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1201n:195_5: dūtaṃ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṃ āyogo, ekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā pahoti, upamaṃ te
anya-e1201n:195_6: karissāmi, añjaliṃ te pagaṇhāmi, tassa phāsu, lokassattho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi
anya-e1201n:195_7: tassa, alaṃ mallo mallassa, samattho mallo millassa, tassa hitaṃ tassa sukhaṃ, svāgataṃ
anya-e1201n:198: Padatthāvadhismā pañcamī vibhatti hoti; gāmasmā āgacchati evaṃ corasmā bhāyati, corasmā uttasati, corasmā tāyati corasmā rakkhatīti.
anya-e1201n:199_0: Savebhāyatha dukkhassa, pamāde bhayadassivā tasanti daṇḍassāti,-chaṭṭhisattamiyo’pi
anya-e1201n:199_1: honteva sambandhādhāravavanicchāyaṃ ajjhenā parājeti, paṭipakkhe parājetīti-savīsayāva
anya-e1201n:199_2: vibhattiyo; sace kevaṭṭassa parajjissāmīti- chaṭṭhīpi hoti sambandhavavanicchāyaṃ,
anya-e1201n:199_3: yavehi gāvo vāreti, pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye, kāke rakkhati taṇḍulāti-savisayeva pañcamī?
anya-e1201n:199_4: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvīti-dutiyāva dissati kammatthe; upajjhāyā antaradhāyati, upajjhāyā
anya-e1201n:199_5: adhīte; kāmato jāyatī sokoti-savisayeva pañcamī; tatthemichaddhayo’pi honteva savisaye;
anya-e1201n:199_6: himacantā pabhavati gaṅgā, pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṃ, añño devadattā, bhinno devadattāti-samisayeva
anya-e1201n:199_7: pañcamī; añño devadattā, bhinno devadattāti-savisayeva pañcami; evaṃ ārā so [ ] āsavakkhayā,
anya-e1201n:199_8: itaro devadattā, uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, pubbo gāmā, pubbeva sambodhā,
anya-e1201n:199_9: tato paraṃ, tato aparena samayena, tatuttarinti, sambandha vacanicchāyaṃ chaṭṭhīpi;
anya-e1201n:199_10: purato gāmassa, dakkhiṇato gāmassa, upari pabbatassa, heṭṭhā pāsādassāti;pāsādamāruyha
anya-e1201n:199_11: pekkhati, pāsādā pekkhati, āsane upavisitvā pekkhati āsanā pekkhatīti-avadhi vacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:199_12: pañcamī; pucchanakhyānesupi; kuto bhavaṃ, pāṭaliputta smāti; tathā desakālamāne’pi;
anya-e1201n:199_13: pāṭaliputtasmā rājagahaṃ satta yojanāni sattasu yojanesūti vā; evamito tiṇṇaṃ māsā
anya-e1201n:199_14: namaccayenāti; kicchā laddhantī-guṇe pañcamī; kacchena me adhi gatanti hetumhi karaṇe
anya-e1201n:199_15: vā tatiyā; evaṃ thokā mutto, tho kena muttoti, thokaṃ valatīti-kriyāvisesane kammani
anya-e1201n:199_16: dutiyā; dūrantikatthayoge’pi savisayeva pañcamīchaṭṭhiyo siyuṃ; dūraṃgāmasmā, antikaṃ
anya-e1201n:199_17: gāmasmā, dūraṃ gāmassa, antikaṃ gāmassāti-dūranti katthe hī tu sabbāva savisaye siyuṃ
anya-e1201n:199_18: bādhakābhāvā; dūro gāmo, antiko gāmotvevamādi; keci panāhu asattavacanehetehi pāṭipadikatthe
anya-e1201n:199_19: dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamiyo sattavacanehi tu sabbāva savisayeti; te panaññeheva
anya-e1201n:199_20: paṭikkhittā; dūraṃ maggo, antikaṃ maggoti- kriyāvisesanaṃ bhudhātussa gamma mānattā;
anya-e1201n:199_21: suddho lobhanīyehi dhammehi, parimutto dukkhasmā, vivicceva kāmehi, gambhīrato ca
anya-e1201n:199_22: puthulato ca yojanaṃ, āyāmena yojanaṃ, tatoppabhuti, yato sarāmi attānantī-savisayeva vibhattiyo.
anya-e1201n:201_0: Vajjane vattamānehi apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti; apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya
anya-e1201n:201_1: āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṃ vajjetvāti attho; vajjaneti kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ parivijjotate vijju,
anya-e1201n:201_2: āpāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti-mariyādābhividhimhiyeva pañcama, vinā pāṭalaputtena
anya-e1201n:201_3: saha veti-viseso; evaṃ yāva pāṭaliputtasma vassi devoti.
anya-e1201n:203_0: Paṭinidhimhi paṭidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī vibhatti hoti; buddhasmā
anya-e1201n:203_1: pati sāriputto, ghatamassa telasmā pati dadāti, paṭinidhipaṭidānesūti-kiṃ? Rukkhaṃ pati vippotate.
anya-e1201n:205: Rite saddena yoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca rite saddhammaṃ, rite saddhammā.
anya-e1201n:207: Vināññatrasaddehi yoge nāmasmā tatiyā ca hoti, dutiyāpañcamiyo ca; vinā vātena, vinā vātaṃ, vinā vātasmā, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṃ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e1201n:209: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca; puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, jasanmā nānā.
anya-e1201n:211: Kriyādhārabhutakattukammānaṃ dhāraṇena yo kriyāyādhāro tasmiṃ kārake nāmasmā sattami hoti; kaṭe nisīdati, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati, ākāse sakuṇā, tilesu telaṃ, gaṅgāyaṃ vajo.
anya-e1201n:213: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti; ajinamhi haññate dīpi, musā vāde pācittiyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:215_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tato sattamī hoti; gāvīsu duyhamānāsu
anya-e1201n:215_1: gato, duddhāsu āgato; bhāvoti kiṃ? Yo jaṭāhi sa bhuñjati; bhāvalakkhaṇanti kiṃ;yo
anya-e1201n:215_2: bhujate so devadatto? Akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassatīti-visayasattamī.
anya-e1201n:217: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tato chaṭṭhī bhavati sattamī cānādare gamyāne.
anya-e1201n:220_0: Gunnaṃ sāmīti-sambandhe chaṭṭhī, geṃsu sāmīti visayasattamī, evaṃ gunnamissaro gosissaro,
anya-e1201n:220_1: gunnaṃ adhipati gosu adhipati, gunnaṃ dāyādo gosu dāyādo gunnaṃ sakkhi gosu sakkhi,
anya-e1201n:220_2: gunnaṃ patibhu gosupatibhu, gunnaṃ pasūto gosu pasūto, kusalā naccagītassa kusalā
anya-e1201n:220_3: naccagīte, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa āyutto kaṭakaraṇe, tathādhāravacanicchāyaṃ pattamī;
anya-e1201n:220_4: bhikkhusu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, bāhāsu gahetvā, hatthesu piddhāya caranti,
anya-e1201n:220_5: pathesu gacchanti, kadalīsu gaje rakkhantīti; ñāṇasmiṃ pasannotivisayasattamī; ñāṇena
anya-e1201n:220_6: pasannoti-karaṇe tatiyā; evaṃ ñāṇasmiṃ ussukko ñāṇena ussukkoti.
anya-e1201n:222_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyatekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ yato taṃ karīyati tato
anya-e1201n:222_1: chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti; sāliyo sūkadhaññānaṃ pathyatamā sāliyo sūkadhaññesu pathya
anya-e1201n:222_2: tamā,kaṇbhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā kaṇhā gāvīsu sampanna khīratamā, gacchataṃ
anya-e1201n:222_3: dhāvanto sīghatamā gacchantesu dhāvanto sīghatamā –- sīlameva sutā seyyoti-avadhimhiyeva pañcamī.
anya-e1201n:224_0: Nāmasmābhidheyyamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti; rukkho, itthi, pumā napuṃsakanti-liṅgampi
anya-e1201n:224_1: saddotthova, tathā doṇo, khārī āḷahakanti-parimāṇampi saddatthova, eko, dve, bahavoti-saṃkhyyāpi saddatthova.
anya-e1201n:226: Yato saddenābhimukhīkaraṇamāmantaṇaṃ tasmiṃ visaye paṭhamā vibhatti hoti; bho purisa, bho itthi, bho napuṃsaka. Chaṭṭhī sambandhe-.
anya-e1201n:227_0: Kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāma tasmiṃ chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:227_1: rañño puriso, sarati rajjassāti- sambandhe kṭṭhī, rajajjasambandhiniṃ satiṃ karotīti
anya-e1201n:227_2: attho; kammavacanicchāyantu dutiyāva; sarati rajjaṃ, tathā rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti,
anya-e1201n:229: Divasassa tijhattuṃ, sakiṃ pakkhassa, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa kumbhiṃ tvevamādi.
anya-e1201n:230_0: Kitakappayoge kattukammesu bahulaṃ sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ chaṭṭhī; sādhu sammato
anya-e1201n:230_1: bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṃ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī, amataṃ
anya-e1201n:230_2: tesaṃ paribhuttaṃ, tassabhavanti vattāro, avisaṃvādako lokassa, alajjīnaṃ nissāya,
anya-e1201n:230_3: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃupādāya pasādotvevamādi; kattukamma vacanicchāyantu tatiyādutiyāyova
anya-e1201n:230_4: sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ, sarasi tvaṃ evarūpiṃ vācā bhāsitā, bhagavantaṃ dassanāyatthemādi.
anya-e1201n:232_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā; tulyo pitu, tulyo pitarā; sadiso pitu, sadiso
anya-e1201n:232_1: pitarā –-iha kathaṃ tatiyayā na hoti; ajjunassa tulā natthi, kesavassupamā nacetinete
anya-e1201n:234: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṃ ṭakārā sabbādesatthā; buddhā, buddhe, atoti-kiṃ? Kaññāyo itthiyo, vadhuyo –- idha kasmā na bhavati aggayo, avidhāna sāmatthiyā.
anya-e1201n:236: Kārantato nāmasmā nīnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākka maṃ; rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni; atottheva-aṭṭhīni.
anya-e1201n:238: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ; buddhā, buddhasmā, buddhe, buddhasmiṃ; atotveva-aggīsmā aggismiṃ.
anya-e1201n:240_0: Akārantato parassa sassa catutthiyā āyo hoti vā; buddhāya, buddhassa, bhiyyo tādatthyeyevāyamāyo
anya-e1201n:240_1: dissate kvavi devaññattha; atotveva-isissa; catutthiyāti-kiṃ? Buddhassa mukhaṃ –-
anya-e1201n:240_2: attatthanti atthasaddena samāso; sabbādito’pi smāsmiṃ sānaṃ ṭāṭñāyā honteva. Niruttikārānumatattā
anya-e1201n:241: “Asmā lokā paramhā ca ubhayā dhaṃsate naro“tyāhaṃ mante paratthaddho; yāyeva kho panatthāya āgaccheyyātho; tamevatthaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kareyyāthoti.
anya-e1201n:243: Ghapato nādīnamekasmiṃ yayā honti yathākkamaṃ; kaññāya, rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā; ekasmintikiṃ?Kaññāhi, rattīhi.
anya-e1201n:245_0: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṃ ssā vā hoti; tassā kataṃ, tassā dīyate, tassā
anya-e1201n:245_1: nissaṭaṃ, tassā pariggaho, tassā patiṭṭhitaṃ, tāya vā; evaṃ etissā, etāya, imissā,
anya-e1201n:245_2: imāya, amussā, amuyā; etehīti-kiṃ? Sabbāya, nādīnaṃtveva-sā, ghapatotvevatena, ekasmiṃtveca-tāhi, amūhi.
anya-e1201n:247: Dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṃkhyānaṃ nuka hoti namhi vibhattimhi; dvinnaṃ, catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ, evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasannaṃ; ukāro uccāraṇattho, kakāro antāvayavattho, tenanamhi na dīgho.
anya-e1201n:249: Namhi bahuno katissa ca sukaka hoti? Bahunnaṃ, katinnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:251: Jhasaññā tito naṃvacanassa ṇṇaṃṇṇannaṃ honti; tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, jhāti-kiṃ?Tissannaṃ.
anya-e1201n:255: Nāmasmā sassa suña hoti; buddhassa–-dvisakārapāṭhena siddhe lāghavatthamidaṃ.
anya-e1201n:257_0: Ssamādisvitarādīnami hoti; itarissaṃ, itarissā, ekissaṃ, ekissā, aññassaṃ, aññassā,
anya-e1201n:257_1: etissaṃ, etissāya, imissaṃ, imissā, imassāya; esviti-kiṃ? Itarāya, esanti-kiṃ? Sabbassaṃ, sabbassā.
anya-e1201n:259: Ssamādisu tassā vā i hoti; tissaṃ, tassaṃ, tissā, tassā, tissāya, tassāya; ssaṃssāssāyesvitveva-tāya.
anya-e1201n:261: Tāetāimāto sassassāyo hoti vā; tassāya, tāya, etissāya, etāya, imissāya, imāya.
anya-e1201n:263: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā; ratto, rattiyaṃ, ādo, ādismiṃ.
anya-e1201n:267: Latuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañcā hoti simhi; kattā pitā; pitu mātu bhātu dhītu duhitu jāmātu nattu hotu potu.
anya-e1201n:269: Latupitādīnaṃ a hoti ge ā ca; bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e1201n:271: A i u iccesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge; bho purisā, bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi, bho bhikkhū, bho bhikkhū.
anya-e1201n:273_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti; hoti kaññe, hoti kaññā, bho brahme, bho brahma,
anya-e1201n:273_1: bho katte, bho katta,bho ise, bho isi, bho sakhe, bho sakha –- sakhi sakhīti-itthiyaṃ
anya-e1201n:275: Ammādīhi gassena hoti; bhoti ammā; bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e1201n:277: Ammādīnaṃ ge rasso hoti vā; bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e1201n:279: Ssamādisu gho rasso hoti; tassaṃ, tassā, tassāya, taṃ, sabhatiṃ –-esviti-kiṃ? Tāya, sahāya.
anya-e1201n:281_0: Ekavacane yosuva ghaokārantavajjitānaṃ nāmānaṃ rassohoti tiliṅge; itthiṃ, itthiyā,
anya-e1201n:281_1: itthiyo, vadhuṃ, vadhuyā, vadhuyo; daddhiṃ, daddhinā, daddhino, sayambhuṃ, sayamabhunā,
anya-e1201n:283: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge?Itthi, itthi, vadhu, vadhu,daddhi, daddhī, sayambhu, sayambhu –- aghonaṃtveva-hoti kaññā, bho go.
anya-e1201n:285: Napuṃsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṃ rasso na hoti. Itthi, daddhī, vadhū, sayambhu –-sisminti-kiṃ?Itthiṃ, anapuṃsakassāti-kiṃ. Daddhi, kulaṃ.
anya-e1201n:287_0: Gasihinaṃ cajjitāsu vibhattisu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti; gāvo, gavo, gāvena, gavena,
anya-e1201n:287_1: gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave; agasihinaṃsūti-kiṃ? Bho go go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṃ.
anya-e1201n:289: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā; gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e1201n:291: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena; gavaṃ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e1201n:293: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavañca vā; gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gonaṃ.
anya-e1201n:295: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā; gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e1201n:297: Aṃvacane gossa gāvu vā hoti; gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ–-gossa goṇādeso na kato saddantarattā.
anya-e1201n:299: Pasaññīto aṃvacanassa yaṃ vā hoti; itthiyaṃ, itthiṃ–-pitoti-kiṃ?Daddhiṃ, rattiṃ.
anya-e1201n:301: Jhasaññīto aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti; daddhinaṃ, daddhiṃ–- kathaṃ? Buddhaṃ ādiccabandhunanti-yogavibhāgā; jhāti-kiṃ? Itthiṃ, ītoti -kiṃ?Aggiṃ
anya-e1201n:303: Jhito yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, daddhino, daddhine, daddhī–-jhītotveva aggī; pumeti-kiṃ?Daddhīni, kulāni.
anya-e1201n:305: Jhito yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge; daddhino tiṭṭhanti, daddhino passa, daddhī vā.
anya-e1201n:307: Jhito smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā; daddhinī, daddhismiṃ, jhito tveva-aggismiṃ.
anya-e1201n:309: Ambuādīhi smino ni hoti vā; phalaṃ patati ambuni,’padumaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ’, vātveva-ambumha, paṃsumhi.
anya-e1201n:311: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā; kammanī, kamme; kamma camma vesma bhasma brahma atta ātuma ghamma muddha–-kammāditoti-kiṃ? Buddhe.
anya-e1201n:313: Kammādito nāvavanassa eno vā hoti; kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā–-kammāditotveva-buddhena.
anya-e1201n:315: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti; aggino, aggissa, daddhino daddhissa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhussa–-kathaṃ?’Yo vā sisso mahāmune’ti.
anya-e1201n:319: Jhalato smāssa nā hoti vā; aagginā aggismā daddhinā, daddhismā, bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmā, sayambhunā, sayambhusmā.
anya-e1201n:321: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā palliṅge; bhikkhavo, bhikkhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhu–-pumeti-kiṃ?Āyūni.
anya-e1201n:323: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge; jantuno, jantavo, jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo, gotrabhaa, sahabhuno, sahabhuvo, sahabhu.
anya-e1201n:325: Kuppaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge; viduno, vidū, viññuno, viñña, sabbaññuno, sabbañña.
anya-e1201n:327: Amusaddato yonaṃ lopova hoti pulliṅge; amū pumetveva-amuyo,amūni; vo’pavādā’yaṃ.
anya-e1201n:329: Amusmā sassa no na hoti; amussa, noti-kiṃ? Amuyā.
anya-e1201n:331: Yonaṃ lope nisuva dīgho hoti; aṭṭhi, aṭṭhīni; yolopa nisūti-kiṃ? Rattiyo.
anya-e1201n:333: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti; aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhani.
anya-e1201n:335: Pañcādīnaṃ vaddasannaṃ sunaṃhisva hoti; pañcasu, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi, chasu, channa, chahi; evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasā.
anya-e1201n:337: Yavādisu ntussa a hoti; guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante, guṇavantena, iccādi–-yvādoti-kiṃ? Guṇavā tiṭṭhati. Amussā-ma.
anya-e1201n:339_0: Aṃsesu ntappaccayayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ci;’ yaṃ yaṃ hirāja bhajati sataṃ vā yadi
anya-e1201n:339_1: vā asaṃ” kiccāni kubbassa kareyya kiccaṃ”himavaṃca pabbataṃ’,’sujāti manto’pi ajātimassa’
anya-e1201n:339_2: yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi’cakkhumā andhitā honti” vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.’
anya-e1201n:341: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge;aggaso aggī–-jhaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Ikārantasamudāyassa ṭo mā siyātirattiyo; iggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Daṇḍino; puveti-kiṃ; aṭṭhi.
anya-e1201n:343: Lasaññassa ussa dvevosu ṭa hoti; bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, vevosūti-kiṃ?Cantuyo; uggahaṇaṃ kiṃ; sayambhuvo.
anya-e1201n:345: Yomhī kvaci lasaññassa vā ṭa hoti; hetayo,’nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayātu’ vāti-kiṃ hetuyo.
anya-e1201n:347: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge; bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, bhikkhū–-pumeti-kiṃ; āyūni; ālapaneti-kiṃ?Cantuyo tiṭṭhanti; lutātvevै-dhenuyo,sayambhuvo.
anya-e1201n:349: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ mhābhimhi vā honti yathā kkamaṃ; buddhamhā, buddhasmā, buddhehi, buddhamhi, buddhasmiṃ–-bahulādhikārāpavādavīsaye’pi; dasasahassimhi dhātuyā.
anya-e1201n:353: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti namhi suhisuca; sabbesaṃ sabbesu, sabbehi–-sabbādīnanti-kiṃ?Buddhānaṃ; assetveva amūsaṃ.
anya-e1201n:354: Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara aññatama;
anya-e1201n:356: Yatya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha (iccete sabbādayo )
anya-e1201n:358: Sabbādito naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃ honti; sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:360: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti; sabbassā, sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:362: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti; sabbassaṃ, sabbāya; amussaṃ, amuyā.
anya-e1201n:364: Ghapato smino yaṃ vā hoti; kaññāyaṃ, daññāya, rattiyaṃ, rattiyā, vadhuyaṃ, vadhuyā, sabbāyaṃ, sabbāya, amuyaṃ, amuyā.
anya-e1201n:366: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṃ vā hoti; sabhatiṃ, sahāya, parisatiṃ, parisāya.
anya-e1201n:368: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi, padasmiṃ, bilasi, bilasmiṃ.
anya-e1201n:370: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā; padasā, padena, bilasā, bilena.
anya-e1201n:372: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā; kodhasā, kodhena, atthasā, atthena.
anya-e1201n:374: Akārantato parassa nāvavanassa enādeso hoti; buddhena; atoti-kiṃ?Agginā.
anya-e1201n:376: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti; buddho; ato tveva-aggi.
anya-e1201n:378_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci;’vanappa gumbe yathā phussitagge’ apavādavisaye’pi
anya-e1201n:378_1: bahulaṃ vidhānā, sukhe, dukkhe–-vāti-kiṃ? Vanappagumbo; kvacīti-kiṃ? Pakkhe sabbattha mā hotu.
anya-e1201n:380: Akārantato nāmasmā sassa aṃ hoti napuṃsakaliṅge rūpaṃ.
anya-e1201n:382: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ni hoti napuṃsake; sabbāni, rūpāni –-niccavidhāne phalamekaccādisabbādanaṃ paṭhamāya.
anya-e1201n:384: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake; aṭṭhini, aṭṭhī, āyūni, āyū.
anya-e1201n:386: Jhalato yonaṃ lopo hoti; aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū, jhalātveva-aggayo; pageva kasmā na hoti; antaraṅgattā ākarassa.
anya-e1201n:388_0: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapasaññohiva paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti; jantu jantuyo,
anya-e1201n:388_1: hetu hetuyo, daddhī daddhīyo, kaññā kaññāyo, rattī rattiyo, itthī itthiyo, deṇū deṇuyā, vैdhū vadhuyo.
anya-e1201n:390_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre; ratyo ratyā ratyaṃ, pokkharañño pokkharañññā
anya-e1201n:390_2: kैthaṃ; anuññāto ahaṃ matyāti?’ Ye passā’ti-yogavibhāgā.
anya-e1201n:392: Nāmasmā gasīnaṃ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve; bho purisa, ayaṃ daddhī.
anya-e1201n:394: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopohoti;va vā evaevaṃ. Etasmāyeva liṅgā [ ] asaṅkhyehi syāthuppattyanumīyate.
anya-e1201n:396_0: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti bahulaṃ; puttīyati, rājapuriso, vāsiṭṭho–-
anya-e1201n:396_1: kvavi na hoti bahulaṃ vidhānā; parantapo. Bhagandaro, parassapadaṃ, attanopadaṃ,
anya-e1201n:396_2: gavampati, devānampiyatisso, antevāsī, janesuto, mamattaṃ, māmako.
anya-e1201n:398: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti; adhitthī–-idha na hoti bahulaṃ vidhānā, yathāpattiyā, yayathāparisāya; pubbasmāti-kiṃ?Gāmaṃ gato.
anya-e1201n:400: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti astu bhavatyapañcamyā; upakumbhaṃ, apañcamiyāti-kiṃ? Upakumbhā ānaya.
anya-e1201n:402: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ tatiyāsattaminaṃ vā aṃ hoti; upakumbhena kataṃ, upakumbhaṃ kataṃ, upakumbhe nidhehi, upakumbhaṃ nidhehi.
anya-e1201n:404: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti; sabbadattena rājinā; vātve varaññā.
anya-e1201n:406: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṃhisu; rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṃ raññaṃ, rājūbhi rājebhi.
anya-e1201n:408: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ ṭe hoti vā sunaṃhisu; esu imesu, esaṃ imesaṃ, ehi imehi–-anitthiyanti-kiṃ? Imāsu, imāyaṃ, imāhi.
anya-e1201n:410: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ nāmhi anैmi iccādesā honti; anena, iminā; anitthiyaṃtveva-imāya.
anya-e1201n:412: Imasaddassānapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi; ayaṃ puriso, ayaṃ itthī; anapuṃsakassāti-kiṃ?Imaṃ.
anya-e1201n:414: Tyatetānamanapuṃsakānaṃ tassa so hoti simhi; syo puriso, syā itthi; evaṃ so, sā, eso, esā –-anapuṃsaka ssetvैva-tyaṃ, taṃ, etaṃ.
anya-e1201n:416: Anapuṃsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi; asu puriso, asu itthi.
anya-e1201n:418: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti; asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṃ amukaṃ, asukāni amukāni.
anya-e1201n:420: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsuvibhattīsu; ne, te, nāyo, tāyo, naṃ, taṃ, nāni, tāni iccādi.
anya-e1201n:422_0: Sādisvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti; assैmassa, asmā, imasmā, asmiṃ imasmiṃ,assāya
anya-e1201n:422_1: imissāya, assaṃ imassaṃ, assā imissā, āsaṃ imāsaṃ, amhā imamhā, amhi imamhi; assa
anya-e1201n:422_2: tassa, asmā tasmā, asmiṃ tasmiṃ, assāya tassāya, assaṃ tassaṃ, assā tassā, āsaṃ tāsaṃ,
anya-e1201n:422_3: amhā tamhā, amhi tamhi. Ssāyādiggahaṇa mādesantare mā hotutī.
anya-e1201n:424: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti;’ yonajja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ atthadhammavidū ise’ vātveva-isi.
anya-e1201n:426: Isismā parassa duyāyossa ṭe vā hoti;’ samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande sampannacaraṇe ise’ vātveva-isayo passa; dutiyassāti-kiṃ?Isayo tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1201n:428: Akārantehi ekaccādīhi yonaṃ ṭe hoti; ekacce tiṭṭhanti, ekacce passa–-atoti-kiṃ? Ekaccāyo; evaṃ esasa paṭhama.
anya-e1201n:430: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti; ekaccāni.
anya-e1201n:431: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti; sabbāni.
anya-e1201n:433: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti; sabbe tiṭṭhanti sabbe passa; atotveva-sabbāyo.
anya-e1201n:435: Nāmabhutehi appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādikāriyantaṃ na hoti; te sabbā, te piyasabbā, te ati sabbā.
anya-e1201n:437: Tatiyatthena yoge sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādi kāriyantaṃ na hoti; māsenapubbānaṃ māsapubbānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:439: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādi kāriyantaṃ na hoti; dakkhiṇuttarapubbānaṃ–-samāseti-kiṃ?Amusañca tesañca dehi.
anya-e1201n:441: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yasseṭa vutto tassa vā hoti; pubbuttare, pubbuttarā.
anya-e1201n:443: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti?Pubbe pubbā, pare parā, apare aparā,dakkhiṇe dakkhiṇā, uttare uttarā, adhare adharā–-chahīti-kiṃ?Ye.[ ]
anya-e1201n:445_0: Manādīhi samīmādīnaṃ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkaṃ; manasi manasmiṃ, manaso manassa,
anya-e1201n:445_1: mano manaṃ, manasā manena, manasā manasmā–-kathaṃ? Putto jāto avetaso, hitvā yāti
anya-e1201n:446: Mana tama tapa teja sira ura vaca oja raja yasa paya
anya-e1201n:451_0: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti gayonāse; bhonta, bhavaṃ, bhonto, bhavanto, bhotā,
anya-e1201n:451_1: bhavatā, bhoto, bhavato–-bho iti-āmantaṇe nipāto’kutonu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’evaṃ
anya-e1201n:453: Aggismā sissa ni hoti vā; agginī,aggi.
anya-e1201n:455: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṃ hoti vā; gacchaṃ, gacchanto.
anya-e1201n:457: Bhudhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā; bhavaṃ.
anya-e1201n:459: Simhi mahantārahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti; mahā, mahaṃ, arahā, arahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:463: Ntussa aṃṅaṃ honti simhi napuṃsake; guṇavaṃ kulaṃ, guṇañca ntaṃ kulaṃ–-napuṃsaketi kiṃ? Sīlavā bhikkhu.
anya-e1201n:465: Himavato simhi ntussa o vā hoti; himavanto, himavā.
anya-e1201n:467: Rājādīhi yayuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti; rājā, yayuvā–-rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma.
anya-e1201n:471: Aṇimā, laghimā–-yuva sā suvā maghava puma vattaha.
anya-e1201n:473: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnaṃ cānaṅi hoti vāmhi; [ ] rājānaṃ, rājaṃ, yuvānaṃ, yuvaṃ.
anya-e1201n:475: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonamāno vā hoti; rājāno, yuvāno–-vātveva-rājā,rāje, yuvā, yuve.
anya-e1201n:477: Sakhato yonamāyono honti vā āno ca; sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno?Vātveva-sakhā, sakhe.
anya-e1201n:479: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti; sakhe niccattho’yamārambho.
anya-e1201n:481: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu; sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
anya-e1201n:483: Sakhassa vā i hotī smānaṃsu; sakhismā, sakhasmā, sakhīnaṃ, sakhānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:485: Sakhassa vā āraṅi hoti yosvaṃhisusmānaṃsu ca; sakhāro sakhāyo, sakhāresu, sakhesu,sakhāraṃ, sakhaṃ, sakhārehi, sakhehi, sakhārā, sakhārasmā, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:487: Latuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ cāraṅi bhoti sato’ññatra; kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṃ, pitaraṃ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari–-aseti-kiṃ?Kattuno, pituno.
anya-e1201n:489: Namhi latupitādīnamāraṅi vā hoti; kattārānaṃ, kattunaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitunnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:492: Namhi latupitādīnamā vā hoti; kattānaṃ, kattūnaṃ, pitānaṃ, pitunnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:494: Latupitādīhi sassa lopo vā hoti; kattu, kattuno, sakamandhātu, sakamandhātuno, pitu, pituno.
anya-e1201n:496: Suhisu latupitādīnamaraṅi vā hoti; kattāresu, kattusu, pitaresu, pitusu, kattārehi, kattuhi, pitarehi, pituhi.
anya-e1201n:498: Yosu nadīsaddassa āmi vā hoti; najjāyo, nadiyo.
anya-e1201n:500: Katimhā yonaṃ ṭi hoti; kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
anya-e1201n:502: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṃkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭo hoti; pañca pañca, evaṃ yāva aṭṭhārasā–-pañcādīhīki-kiṃ? Dve tayo cattāro; cuddasabhīti-kiṃ? Dvevīsatiyo.
anya-e1201n:504: Ubhagohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti; ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo–-kathaṃ? Imekarattiṃ ubhayo vasāmāti- ṭomhi yakārāgamo.
anya-e1201n:506: Āraṅādesato paresaṃ yonaṃ ṭo hoti; sakhāro, kattāro, pataro.
anya-e1201n:508: Āraṅādesamhā yonaṃ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ; sakhāro, sakhāre, sakhāro–-ṭoggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:510: Āraṅādesamhā nāsmānaṃ ṭā hoti; kattārā, kattārā, kvaci vā hoti bahakulādhikārā; etādisā sakhārasmā
anya-e1201n:512: Āraṅādesamhā smino ṭi hoti; kattari, pitari.
anya-e1201n:514: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti; divi, bhuvi–-niccaṃ vakārāgamo.
anya-e1201n:516: Smimhi āro rasso hoti; kattari, nattari.
anya-e1201n:518: Nattvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattisu; pitaro, pitaraṃ–-anattvādīnanti kiṃ? Nattāro.
anya-e1201n:520: Suhisu yuvādīnaṃ ānaṅi hoti; yayuvānesu, yuvānehi.
anya-e1201n:522: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti; yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e1201n:524: Yuvādīhiṃ smāsminnaṃ nāne honti yathākkamaṃ; yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e1201n:526: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamiṃ; yuvāno yuvāne–-vāti-kiṃ?Yuve passa;noggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:528: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, tomaraṃkusa pāṇino, tomaraṃkusapāṇine, vātveva-tomaraṃkusapāṇayo; aññattheti-kiṃ?Pāṇayo.
anya-e1201n:530: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci;’ kataññumhi ca posamhi sīlavante ariyavuttine’ vātveva-ariyavuttimhi; pumetveva-ariyayavuttiyā.
anya-e1201n:532: Pumasaddato smino yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vā hoti; pumānepume.
anya-e1201n:534: Pumassa nāmhi yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vā hoti; pumānā pumena.
anya-e1201n:536: Pumassa sumhi yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ ā ca vā hoti; pumānesu, pumesu, pumāsu.
anya-e1201n:538: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti; bho pumaṃ, bho puma, bho itthipumaṃ, bho itthipuma.
anya-e1201n:540: Sāsaddassa ānaṅi hoti aṃse ge ca; sānaṃ, sānassa, bho sāna.
anya-e1201n:542: Vattahā sanannaṃ nonānaṃ honti yathākkama; vattahā no, vattahānānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:544: Brahmassu vā hoti sanaṃsu; brahmuno, brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ brahmānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:548_0: Pudīnamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca; pumuno, pumassa; pumunā, pumānā, pumunā, pumānā;
anya-e1201n:548_1: kammuno, kammassa; kammunā kammasmā; kammunā, kammanā; ṭhāmuno, ṭhāmassa;ṭhāmunā,
anya-e1201n:548_2: ṭhāmasmā; ṭhāmunā, ṭhāmena; addhuno, addhassa; addhunā, addhasmā;addhunā, addhanā.
anya-e1201n:550: Yuvā sassavā ino hoti, yuvino, yuvassa.
anya-e1201n:552: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā; attano, attassa; ātumano, ātumassa.
anya-e1201n:554: Attaātumānaṃ suhisu vā naka hoti; attanesu, attesu, ātumanesu, ātumesu; attanehi, attehi; ātumanehi, ātumehi–-kathaṃ?Verinesūti-naka iti yogavibhāgā.
anya-e1201n:556: Brahma attaātumehi ca smāssa nā hoti; brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
anya-e1201n:558_0: Imaetasaddānaṃ kathitānukathanavisaye dutiyāyamenādeso hoti; imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayamajjhāpayaatho
anya-e1201n:558_1: enaṃ dhammamajjhāpaya, ime bhikkhū vinayamajjhāpaya atho ene dhammamajjhāpaya; evame tassa ca yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:560: Sabbāsu vibhattisukissako hoti; ko, ke, kā, kāyo, kaṃ, kāni, keneccādi.
anya-e1201n:562: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu; kissa, kassa, kismiṃ, kasmiṃ; anitthiyanti-kiṃ? Ko, kaṃ.
anya-e1201n:564: Aṃsisu saha tehiimassidaṃ hoti vā napuṃsake; idaṃ, imaṃ; idaṃ,imaṃ.
anya-e1201n:566: Aṃsisu saha tehi amussa aduṃ hoti vā napuṃsake; aduṃ, amuṃ; aduṃ, amuṃ.
anya-e1201n:568: Ahmassa asmā hoti vā sumhi; bhattīrasmāsu sā tava; vātveva-amhesu.
anya-e1201n:570: Namhi ticatunnaṃ tissavatassā hontitthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ; tissannaṃ, vatassannaṃ; itthiyanti-kiṃ? Tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:571: Tissocatasso yomhi savibhattīnaṃ-. Vibhattisahitānaṃ tivatunnaṃ yomhi tisso catasso hontitthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ; tisso,catasso
anya-e1201n:573: Yomhisavibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃtīṇi cattāri honti napuṃsake; tīṇi, cattāri.
anya-e1201n:575: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge; tayo, cattāro.
anya-e1201n:577: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yombhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge; caturo janā saṃvidhāya; kathaṃ? Caturo nimittenāddasāsinti liṅgavipallāsā.
anya-e1201n:579: Yeyāsvamhassa savibhattissaasmākaṃmamaṃ honti vā yathākkamaṃ; asmākaṃ, amhākaṃ; mamaṃ, mama.
anya-e1201n:581: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti; ahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:583: Amhī simhi ca tuhmassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; tuvaṃ, tvaṃ.
anya-e1201n:585: Tumhassatayātayīnaṃ takārassatva hoti vā; tvayā, tayā; tvayi, tayi.
anya-e1201n:587: Smāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā; pattā nissaṃsayaṃ [ ] tvamhā–-vātveva-tvayā.
anya-e1201n:589: Paṭhame yomhi ntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ nto iccādeso vā hoti; gacchanto, gacchantā; guṇavanto, guṇavantā.
anya-e1201n:591: Namhi ntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ taṃ vā hoti; gacchataṃ, gacchantānaṃ; guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:593_0: Sādisuntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṃ; gacchato, gacchantassa;
anya-e1201n:593_1: guṇavato, guṇavantassa; gacchatā, gacchantamhā; guṇavatā, guṇavantamhā; gacchati,
anya-e1201n:593_2: gacchante;guṇavati, guṇavante; gacchatā, gacchantena; guṇavatā, guṇavantena.
anya-e1201n:595: Ge pare ntantunaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭaṭāaṃ iccādesā honti; bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bhoka gacchaṃ; bho guṇava, bho guṇavā, bho guṇavaṃ.
anya-e1201n:597: Yomhi dvissa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṃ; duve, dve.
anya-e1201n:599: Namhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā; duvinnaṃ, dvinnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:601: Namhi rājasaddassasavibhattissaraññaṃ hoti vā; raññaṃ, rajānaṃ
anya-e1201n:603: Nāsmāsu rājassa savibhattissaraññā hoti, raññā kataṃ, raññānissaṭaṃ.
anya-e1201n:605: Se rājassa savibhattissa raññoraññassarājino hontī; rañño, raññassa, rājino.
anya-e1201n:607: Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññerājini honti; raññe,rājini.
anya-e1201n:609: Samāsavisaye ete ādesā rājassavā honti; kāsiraññā, kāsirājena; kāsiraññā, kāsirājasmā; kāsirañño, kāsirājassa; kāsiraññe, kāsirāje.
anya-e1201n:611: Smimhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayimayi honti yathākkamaṃ; tayi,mayayi.
anya-e1201n:613: Amhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃmaṃtavaṃmamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e1201n:615: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayāmayā honti yathākkamaṃ; tayā kataṃ, mayā kataṃ; tayā nissaṭaṃ, mayā nissaṭaṃ.
anya-e1201n:617: Setumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavamamatuyhaṃmayhaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; tava, tuyhaṃ; mama,mayhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:619: Namhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ honti paccekaṃ; tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ–-yathāsaṅkhyamatra na vivacchate.
anya-e1201n:621: Tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ paccekaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ vā honti yomhi dutiye; tumhaṃ’tumhākaṃ, tumhe; amhaṃ,amhākaṃ,amhe.
anya-e1201n:623: Idamadhikataṃ veditabbaṃ; pajjate’nenatthoti-padaṃ, syādyantaṃ tyādyāntañca; padasamūho vākyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:625_0: Apañcamiyā yonaṃhisvapādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ
anya-e1201n:625_1: savibhattīnaṃ vo no honti vā yathākkamaṃ; tiṭṭhatha vo, tiṭṭhatha tumhe; tiṭṭhāma
anya-e1201n:625_2: no, tiṭṭhāma mayaṃ; passati vo, passati tumhe; passati no, passatiamhe; dīyate vo,
anya-e1201n:626: Dīyate amhaṃ; dhanaṃ vo, dhanaṃ tumhaṃ; dhanaṃ no, dhanaṃ amhaṃ; kataṃ vo, kataṃ tumhehi; kataṃ no, kataṃ amhehi–-apañcamyāti-kiṃ?Nissaṭaṃ tumhehi, nissaṭaṃ amhehi; apādādotveva
anya-e1201n:629: Padatotveva- tumhe tiṭṭhatha; ekavākyetveva- devadatto tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhathanagare; savibhattīnaṃtveva- arahati dhammo tumhādinaṃ; arahati dhammo amhādisānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:631_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ eka vākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaambhasaddānaṃ
anya-e1201n:631_1: savibhattīnaṃ teme vā honti yathākkamaṃ; kataṃ te, kataṃ tayā; kataṃme, kataṃ mayā;
anya-e1201n:631_2: dīyate te, dīyate tava; dīyate me, dīyayate mama; dhanaṃ te, dhanaṃme, dhanaṃ mama.
anya-e1201n:633: Kathitānukathanavisaye tumhaamhasaddānamādesā niccaṃ bhavanti punabbidhānā; gāmo tumhaṃ pariggaho, atho janapado vo pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:635_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṃ tumhaamhasaddānamā desā vā honti anvādese’pi;
anya-e1201n:635_1: gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho nagare kambalo vo; atho nagare kambalo tumhākaṃ; sapubbāti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:635_2: Paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho kambalo vo; paṭha mantāti-kiṃ-paṭo nagare tumhākaṃ, atho kambalo gāme vo.
anya-e1201n:637_0: Cādīhi yoge tumhaamhasaddānamādesā na honti; gāmo tava ca pariggaho, mama ca pariggaho;
anya-e1201n:637_1: gāmo tava vā pariggaho, mama vā pariggaho; gāmo tavaha pariggaho, mamaha pariggaho;
anya-e1201n:637_2: gāmo tavāha pariggaho, mamāha parigga ho; gāmā taveva pariggaho, mameva pariggaho;
anya-e1201n:637_3: evaṃ sabbattha udāhararitabbaṃ–-yogeti kiṃ? Gāmoca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:639: Dassanatthesu ālocanavajjitesu payujjamānesu tumha amhasaddānamādesā na honti; gāmo tumhe uddissāgato, gāmo amhe uddissāgato–-anālocaneti-kiṃ? Gāmo vo āloveti, gāmo no āloceti.
anya-e1201n:641_0: Āmantaṇaṃ pubbamavijjamānaṃ viya hoti tumhaamhasaddāna mādesavisaye; devadatta tava
anya-e1201n:641_1: pariggaho–-āmantaṇantikiṃ? Kambalo te pariggaho; pubbanti-kiṃ?’Mayetaṃ sabba makkhātaṃ
anya-e1201n:641_2: tumhākaṃ dvijapuṅgavā’ parassa hi [ ] avijjamānantā apādādoti-paṭisedhona siyā? Ivāti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:643_0: Samānādhikaraṇe parato sāmaññavacanamāmantaṇamasantaṃ viya na hoti; māṇavaka jaṭilaka
anya-e1201n:643_1: tepariggaho–-parassā vijjamānatte’pi pubbarūpamupādāyādeso hoti; sāmañña vacananti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:643_2: Devadatta māṇavaka tava pariggaho; ekatthetikiṃ? Devadatta yaññadatta tumhaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:645: Bahusu vattamānamāmantaṇaṃ sāmaññavacanamekatthe avijjamānaṃ viya vā na hoti; brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṃ pariggaho; brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:646: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ syādikaṇḍo dutiyo.
anya-e1201n:648: Syādyantaṃ syādyāntena sahekatthaṃ hotīti-idamadhikataṃ veditabbaṃ; so ca bhinnatthānamekatthibhāvo samāsoti vuccate.
anya-e1201n:650_0: Asaṃkhyaṃ syyādyantaṃ vibhatyādīnamatthe vattamānaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ bhavati;
anya-e1201n:650_1: tattha vibhatyatthe tāva-itthisu kathā pavattā adhitthi–-sampatti dvidhā attasampatti
anya-e1201n:650_2: samiddhi casampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ, licchavīnaṃ; samiddhi bhikkhānaṃ subhikkhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:650_4: sambandhibhedā bahuvidho; tatra iddhābhāve-vigatā iddhi saddikānaṃ dussaddikaṃ; atthābhāve-abhāvo
anya-e1201n:650_5: makkhikānaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ; atikkamābhāve-atigatāni tiṇāni nittiṇaṃ; sampatābhāve-atigataṃ
anya-e1201n:650_6: lahupāpuraṇaṃ ati lahupāpuraṇaṃ; lahupāpuraṇassa nāyamupabhogakāloti attho. Yayathāttho’nekavidho;
anya-e1201n:650_7: tatra yoggatāyaṃ-anurūpaṃ surūpo vahati; vicchāyaṃ -anvaddhamāsaṃ; atthānativattiyaṃ-
anya-e1201n:650_8: yathāsatti; sadisatte- sadiso kikhiyā[ ] sakikhi; ānupubbiyaṃ- anujeṭṭhaṃ; pacchātthe
anya-e1201n:652: Yathāsaddotulyatthe vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho na bhavati; yathā devadatto tathā yaññadatto.
anya-e1201n:654_0: Yāvasaddo’vadhāraṇe vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho bhavati; avadhāraṇamettakatā
anya-e1201n:654_1: paricchedo; yāvāmattaṃ brāhmaṇe āmantaya; yāvajīvaṃ–-avadhāraṇeti-kiṃ, yāva dinnaṃtāva
anya-e1201n:656_0: Pariādayo vañcamyantena sahekatthā honti vā; pari pabbataṃ vassi devo, paripabbatā;
anya-e1201n:656_1: apapabbataṃ vassi devo, apa pabbatā; āpāṭaliputtaṃ vassidevo, āpāṭaliputtā; bahigāmaṃ,
anya-e1201n:656_2: bahigāmā; tiropabbataṃ, tiropabbatā; purebhattaṃ, purebhattā; pacchābhattaṃ, pacchābhattā–-vetādhikāro
anya-e1201n:658: Anusaddo sāmīpye āyāme ca vattamāno syādyantena sahekattho hotī vā; anuvanamasani gatā; anugaṅgaṃ bārāṇasī–-samīpāyāmesviti-kiṃ, rukkhamanuvijjotate vijju.
anya-e1201n:660_0: Tiṭṭhaguppabhutīni, ekatthibhāvavisaye nipātīyante;’tiṭṭhantī gāvo yasmiṃ kāle’tiṭṭhagu,
anya-e1201n:660_1: kālo; vahaggu, kālo; āyatigavaṃ, khaleyavaṃ, lūnayavaṃ, lūyamānayavamiccādi–-vyanto’pettha;
anya-e1201n:660_2: kesākesi; daṇḍādaṇḍi–-tathā velāppabhāvanattho’pi; pāto nahānaṃ pātanahānaṃ; sāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:660_3: nahānaṃ sāyanahānaṃ; pātakālaṃ, sāyakālaṃ; pātameghaṃ, sāyameghaṃ; pātamaggaṃ, sāyamaggaṃ.
anya-e1201n:662_0: Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhiyantena sahekatthā vā honti; ekārantattaṃ nipātanato–-oregaṅgaṃ;
anya-e1201n:662_1: uparisikharaṃ; paṭi sotaṃ; pāreyamunaṃ; majjhegaṅgaṃ; heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ; uddhagaṅgaṃ;
anya-e1201n:662_2: adhogaṅgaṃ; antopāsādaṃ–-puna vāvidhānā gaṅgāoramiccā dipi hoti.
anya-e1201n:664: Yadetamatakkantamekatthaṃ taṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ veditabbaṃ; tathā vevodāhaṭaṃ; vā kvaci bahulādhikārā–-yathāparisaṃ, yathā parisāya; sakāya sakāya parisāyāti attho.
anya-e1201n:666_0: Amādisyādyantaṃ syādyāntena saha bahulamekatthaṃ hoti;’gāmaṃ gato’ gāmagato;’muhuttaṃ
anya-e1201n:666_1: sukhaṃ’ muhuttasukhaṃ. Vuttiye vopapadasamāse-kumbhakāro; sapāko; tantavāyo; carā
anya-e1201n:666_2: haro–-ntamānaktavantuhi vākyameva; dhammaṃ suṇanto; dhammaṃ suṇamāno; odanaṃ bhuttavā.’
anya-e1201n:667_0: Raññā hato’ rājahato;’asinā chinno’ asicchinno; pitusadiso; pitusamo; sukhasahagataṃ;’dadhinā
anya-e1201n:667_1: upasittaṃ bhojanaṃ’dadhibhojanaṃ;’guḷena misso odano’ guḷodano. Vutti padenevopasittādikriyāyākhyāpanato natthāyuttatthatā.
anya-e1201n:668: Kvavi vuttiyeva; urago pādapo–-kvavi vākyameva; pharasunā chinnavā; dassanena pahātabbā.’
anya-e1201n:669: Buddhassadeyyaṃ’ buddhadeyyaṃ;’yūpāya dāru’ yūpadāru;’rajanāya doṇi’ rajanadoṇi; idha na hoti-saṅghassa dātabbaṃ–-kathaṃ, etadattho etadatthanti-aññapadatthe bhavissati.’
anya-e1201n:670: Savarehi bhayaṃ’ savarabhayaṃ; gāmaniggato, methunāpeto. Kvaci vuttiyeva; kammajaṃ, cittajaṃ–-idha na hoti-rukkhā patito.’
anya-e1201n:671_1: na hoti; mamānukubbaṃ; mamānu kurumāno; gunnaṃ kaṇhā sampannakhīratamā; sissānaṃ
anya-e1201n:671_2: pañcamo; paṭassa sukkatā–-kvaci hoteva; vattamānasāmīpyaṃ–-kathaṃ brāhmaṇassa sukkā
anya-e1201n:671_3: dantāti-sāpekkhatāya na hoti–-idha panahoteva candanagandho; nadīghoso; kaññārūpaṃ;
anya-e1201n:671_5: gehanti; sāpekkha tāya na hoti–-raññopāṭaliputtakassadhananti–-dhana sambandhe chaṭṭhīti
anya-e1201n:671_6: pāṭaliputtakैnasambandhābhāvā nahessati; rañño’gova asso ca puriso cā’ti bhīnnatthatāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:671_7: [ ] vākya meva–-’rañño gavāssapurisā rājagavāssapurisāti vutti hotevekatthibhāve.’Dānesoṇḍo’
anya-e1201n:671_8: dānasoṇḍo; dhammarato; dānabhirato–-kvacivuttiyeva; kucchisayo; thalaṭṭho; paṅkajaṃ;
anya-e1201n:671_9: saroruhaṃ idha na hoti bhojane mattaññutā; indriyesu guttadvāratā; āsane nisinno āsane nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:673_0: Visesanaṃ syādyantaṃ visessena syādyāntena samānādhikaraṇenasahekatthaṃ hoti;’nīlañca
anya-e1201n:673_1: taṃ uppalañce’ti niluppalaṃ,’chinnañca taṃ parūḷhañce’ti chinnaparūḷhaṃ; satthiva
anya-e1201n:673_2: satthī,’satthī ca sāsāmā ce’ti satthisāmā; sīhova sīho,’muni ca sosīho vā’timunisīho;’sīlameva
anya-e1201n:673_3: dhanaṃ’ sīladhanaṃ–-kci vākyameva, puṇṇo mantāṇiputto; citto gahapati.–-Kvaci vuttiyeva;
anya-e1201n:673_4: kaṇhasappo; lohitasāli. Visesananti-kiṃ? Tacchako sappo. Ekattheneti-kiṃ? Kāḷamhā
anya-e1201n:673_5: añño–-kathaṃ, patta jīviko āpannajīviko[ ] māsajātoti-aññapadatthe bhavissati.
anya-e1201n:675_0: Nañiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahekatthaṃ hoti; na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo–-bahulādhikārato

anya-e1201n:779: Esaṃ ṭa hotuttarapadekvaci vā; bhavampatiṭṭhā mayaṃ; bhāgavamamūlakā no dhammā–-bahulādhikārā tarādisu ca; pageva mahattarī; rattaññumahattaṃ.

anya-e1201n:803: Bhāsitapumitthi paccaye kvaci pumeva hoti; vyattatarā, vyyattatamā.
anya-e1201n:805: Itthivācakā sabbādayo vuttimatte pumeva honti; tassā mukhaṃ’ tammukhaṃ; tassaṃ tatra; tāya tato; tassaṃvelāyaṃ tadā.
