anya-e1201n:845_0: Rīrikkhakesu tumhāmhānaṃ tāmā hontekasmiṃ yathākkamaṃ; tādī, tādikkho, tādiso;mādī,
anya-e1201n:845_1: mādikkho, mādiso; –-ekasminti-kiṃ? Tumhādī, amhādī, tumhādikkho, amhādikkho, tumhādiso, amhādiso.
anya-e1201n:847: Rīrikkhakantato’ññasmiṃ uttarapade tumhāmhāname kasmiṃ taṃmaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; tandīpā; mandīpā; taṃ saraṇā, maṃsaraṇā; tayyogo mayyogoti-bindulopo.
anya-e1201n:849: Rīrikkhakesvetasseṭa vā hoti; edī, etādī; edikkho, etādikkho; ediso, etādiso.
anya-e1201n:851: Dvissa du hoti vidhādisu; duvidho, dupaṭṭaṃ; evamādi.
anya-e1201n:853: Guṇādisu dvissa di hoti; diguṇaṃ, dirattaṃ, digu; evamādi
anya-e1201n:855: Tīsu dvissa a hoti; dvattikkhattuṃ, dvattipattapūrā.
anya-e1201n:857: Saṃkhyāyamuttarapade dvissaā hotasadādo’naññatthe; dvādasa, dvāvīsati, dvattiṃsa; saṃkhyāyanti-kiṃ?’Dirattaṃ; asatādoti-kiṃ? Dvisataṃ, dvisahassaṃ; anaññattheti-kiṃ?Dvidasā.
anya-e1201n:859: Saṃkhyāyamuttarapade tissa ehotasatādo’naññatthe; terasa, tevisa, tettiṃsa–-saṃkhyāyantveva-tirattaṃ; asatādotveva-tisataṃ; anaññatthetveva-tivatukā.
anya-e1201n:861: Tissevā hoti cattālīsādo; tecattālīsa, ticattālīsa; tepaññāsa, tipaññāsa; tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi; tesattati, tīsattatī; tñasīti, tiyāsīti; tenavuti, tinavuti–-asatādotveva-tisataṃ.
anya-e1201n:863: Asatādo’naññatthe cattālīsādo dvisse vā hoti āva dvecattālīsaṃ, dvācattāsaṃ, dvicattālīsaṃ; dvepaññāsaṃ, dvāpaññāsaṃ, dvipaññāsaṃ; iccādi.
anya-e1201n:865: Dvissa bā vā hotacattālīsādo’naññatthe; bārasa, dvādasa; bāvīsati, dvāvīsati; battiṃsa, dvattiṃsa–-acattālīsādoti-kiṃ? Dvicattālīsa.
anya-e1201n:867: Vīsatidasesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇupannā honti vā yathākkamaṃ; paṇṇuvīsati, pañcavīsati;pannarasa, pañcadasa.
anya-e1201n:869: Catussa cuco honti vā dasasadde pare; cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa.
anya-e1201n:871: Chassa so iccayamādeso hoti dasasadde pare; soḷasa.
anya-e1201n:873: Ekaaṭṭhānaṃ ā hoti dase pare; ekādasa, aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e1201n:875_0: Saṃkhyāto parassa dasassara hoti vibhāsā; ekārasa, ekādasa; bārasa, dvādasa; pannarasa,
anya-e1201n:875_1: pañcadasa; sattarasa, sattadasa; aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa–-pannabādesesu niccaṃ, idha na hoti catuddasa.
anya-e1201n:877: Chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷo hoti ro ca; soḷasa, sorasa; teḷasa, terasa.
anya-e1201n:879: Aḍḍhā paresaṃ catutthatatiyānaṃ uḍḍhatiyā honti yathākkamaṃ;’aḍḍhana catuttho’ aḍḍhuḍḍho,’aḍḍhena tatiyo’ aḍḍhatiyo–-kathaṃ?Aḍḍhateyyoti-sakatthe ṇye uttara padavuddhi.
anya-e1201n:881: Aḍḍhā parassa dutiyassa sahaaḍḍhasaddena diyaḍḍhadivaḍḍhā honti;’ aḍḍhena dutiyo’ diyaḍḍho, divaḍḍho vā.
anya-e1201n:883: Kussuttarapadatthe vattamānassa sarādo uttarapade kadā desohoti; kadannaṃ, kadasanaṃ–-sareti-kiṃ? Kuputto; uttarattheti-kiṃ? Kuoṭṭho; rājā.
anya-e1201n:885: Appatthe vattamānassa kussakā hotuttarapadatthe;’appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ’ kālavaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:887: Kussa purisekā hoti vā; kāpuriso, kupuriso–-ayamappattavibhāsā–-appatthe tupubbenaniccaṃhoti;’īsaṃ puriso’ kāpuriso.
anya-e1201n:888: Pubbādīhuttarapadassaahassa anhādeso hoti; pubbanho; aparanho; ajajanho; sāyanho; majjhanho.
anya-e1201n:889: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ samāsakaṇḍo tatiyo.
anya-e1201n:890_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vā ṇappaccayo hotapacce’bhidheye; ṇakāro vuddhyattho; evamaññatrāpi,’vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ’
anya-e1201n:890_1: vāsiṭṭho, vāsiṭṭhī vā; opagavo, opagavī vā –-veti-vākya samāsavikappatthaṃ tassādhikāro sakatthāvadhi.
anya-e1201n:892_0: Vacchādīhi apaccappaccayantehi hottādīhica saddehi ṇānaṇāyanappaccayā vā hontapacce.
anya-e1201n:892_1: Vacchāno vacchāyano; kaccāno, kaccāyano–-yāgame-kātiyāno; moggallāno, moggallāyano;
anya-e1201n:893: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerā vā yathākkamaṃ hontapacce. Kattikeyyo. Venateyyo; bhāgīneyyo iccādi–-vedhavero; vandhakero; nāḷikero; sāmaṇero iccādi.
anya-e1201n:895: Ditippabhutīhi ṇyo vā hotapacce. Decco; ādicco; koṇḍañño; gaggyo; bhātabbo; iccādi
anya-e1201n:897: Akārantato ṇi vā hotapacce dakkhi; doṇi; vāsavi; vāruṇiccādi.
anya-e1201n:899: Rājasaddato ñño vā hotapacce jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ. Rājañño–-jātiyanti kiṃ?Rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e1201n:900: Khattā yiyā-. Khattasaddā yeyā hontapacce jātiyaṃ khatyo; khattiyo jātiyayantve-khatti.
anya-e1201n:902: Manusaddato jātiyaṃ ssasaṇa hontapacce. Manusso; mānuso? Itthiyaṃ-manussā; mānusī–-jātiyantveva-māṇavo.
anya-e1201n:904_0: Janapadassa yaṃ nāmaṃ tannāmasmā khattiyāpacce raññova ṇo hoti. Pañcālo; kosalo;
anya-e1201n:904_1: māgadho; okkāko–-janapadanāmasmāti-kiṃ? Dāsarathi; khattiyāti-kiṃ?’Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassāpaccaṃ’ pañcāla.
anya-e1201n:906: Kurusivīhapacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti; korabyo sebyo.
anya-e1201n:908_0: Rāgavācitatiyantato rattamiccetasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti’kasāvena rattaṃ’ kāsāvaṃ;kosumbhaṃ;
anya-e1201n:908_1: hāliddaṃ–-rāgāti kiṃ? Devadattena rattaṃ vatthaṃ; idha kasmā nahoti? Nīlaṃ pītanti–-guṇavacanattā
anya-e1201n:910_0: Tatiyantato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇo hoti; taṃ ce nakkhantaminduyuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1201n:910_1: Phussī, rattī; phusso, aho–-nakkhatteneti-kiṃ? Gurunā lakkhitā ratti; indu yanutteneti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:910_2: Kattikāya lakkhito muhutto; kāleti-kiṃ? Phussenalakkhitā atthasiddhi–-ajjakattikāti
anya-e1201n:912_0: Seti paṭhamantā assāti chaṭṭhatthe ṇo bhavati yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ sā ve devatā puṇṇamāsī
anya-e1201n:912_1: vā.’Sugato devatā assā’ti sogato; māhindo; yāmo; vāruṇo; phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinī’ti
anya-e1201n:912_2: phusso, māgho; māgho; phagguno; citto; vesākho;peṭṭhamulo; āsāḷho; sāvaṇo; poṭṭhapādo;
anya-e1201n:912_3: assayujo; kattiko; māgasiro–-puṇṇamāsīti-kiṃ, phussi pañcamī assa–-puṇṇamāsīva gatakamāsasambandhinī
anya-e1201n:912_4: na hoti;’puṇṇo mā assanti’ nibbacanā–-ato eva nipātanā ṇo, sāgamo ca, māsasutīyāva
anya-e1201n:914_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte taṃ jānātīti etesphatthesuṇo hoti ko ṇikova.’ Vyākaraṇamadhīte
anya-e1201n:914_1: jānāti vā’ veyyākaraṇo; chāndaso; kamako; padako; venayiko; suttantiko–-dvitaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1201n:916: Chaṭhiyantā visaye desarūpe ṇo hoti.’Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso’vāsāto–-deseti kiṃ? Cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ, devadattassa visayo’nuvāko.
anya-e1201n:918: Chaṭṭhiyantā nivāse dese tannāme ṇo hoti;’sivīnaṃ nivāso desosebyo; vāsāto.
anya-e1201n:920: Chaṭṭhiyantā adūrabhave desetannāme ṇo hoti;’vidasāya adurabhavaṃ’ vedisaṃ.
anya-e1201n:922: Tatiyantā nibbatte desetannāme ṇo hoti; kusambena nibbattā kosambī, nagarī; kākandī, mākandī,’sahassena nibbattā’ sāhassī, parikhā–-hetumhi kattarikaraṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
anya-e1201n:924: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti, yantaṃ paṭhamantamatthi ce;’udumbarā asmiṃ dese santī’ti odumbaro, bādaro, babbajo.
anya-e1201n:926: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇo hoti;’udake bhavo’odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho, kāpilavatthavo, kosambo.
anya-e1201n:928: Bhavatthe ajjādīhi tano hoti;’ajja bhavo’ ajjatano, svātano, hiyyattano.
anya-e1201n:930: Purā iccasmā bhavatthe ṇo hoti tano ca; purāṇo, purātano.
anya-e1201n:931: Amātthacco-. Amāsaddato acco hoti bhavatthe; amacco.
anya-e1201n:933: Majjhādīhi sattamyantehi bhavatthe imo hoti; majjhimo, antimo–-majkjdhaanta heṭṭhā upari ora pāra pacchā abbhantara paccanta.
anya-e1201n:935_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bhavatthe; kaṇa-’kusinārāyaṃ bhavo’ kosinārako, māgadhako,
anya-e1201n:935_2: campeyyako; mithileyyakoti-eyyako–-ya-gammo, dibbo; iyagāmiyo, udariyo, diviyo, pañcāliyo,
anya-e1201n:937: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti; sāradiko, divaso; sāradikā, ratti.
anya-e1201n:938: Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ-.
anya-e1201n:939_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaḍhatthe ṇiko hoti;’vīṇāvādanaṃ sippamassa’ veṇiko,
anya-e1201n:939_2: gandhiko, teliko, goḷiko’cāpo paharaṇamassa’ cāpiko, tomariko, muggariko;’upadhippa
anya-e1201n:940_0: Taṃ hantarahati gacchatuñchati carati-. Dutiyantā hantīti evamādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti;
anya-e1201n:940_1: pakkhīhi-’pakkhino hantī’ti pakkhiko, sākuṇiko, māyuriko–-macchehi- macchiko, meniko–-migehi
anya-e1201n:940_2: māgaviko, hāriṇiko, - sūkarikoti- iko;’satamarahatī’ti sātikaṃ, sandiṭṭhikaṃ;’ehi
anya-e1201n:940_3: passa vidhiṃ rahatī’ti ehipassiko, sāhassiko–-sahassiyotīdha iyo;’paradāraṃ gacchatī’ti
anya-e1201n:940_4: pāradāriko, maggiko, paññāsayojaniko;’ badare uñchatī’ti bādariko, sāmākiko;’dhammaṃ
anya-e1201n:941: Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamahisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaḍhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jivati-.
anya-e1201n:942_0: Tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’kāyena kataṃ’ kāyikaṃ, vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ;’vātenakato
anya-e1201n:942_1: ābādho’ vātiko–-’satena kītaṃ’ sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ, mūlatova-devadattena kītoti na
anya-e1201n:942_2: hoti tadatthāppatītiyā–-’varattāya baddho’ vārattiko, āyasiko, pāsiko; –-’ghatena
anya-e1201n:942_3: abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā’ ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ–-’jālena hato
anya-e1201n:942_4: hantīti vā’ jāliko, bāḷisiko–-’akkhohi jita’makkhikaṃ, sālākikaṃ–-’akkhehi jayati
anya-e1201n:942_5: dibbati vā’ akkhiko–-’khaṇittiyā khaṇatī’ti khāṇittiko, kuddāliko-devadattena jitamaṅgulyā
anya-e1201n:942_6: khaṇatīti na hoti tadatthā navagamā–-’uḷumpena taratī’ti oḷumpiko; uḷumpikoti-iko;
anya-e1201n:942_7: gopucchiko; nāviko–-’sakaṭena caratī’ti sākaṭiko. Rathiko–-parappikoti iko-’khandhena
anya-e1201n:942_8: vahatī’ti khandhiko, aṃsiko; sīsikoti-iko–-’vetatena jīvatī’ti khandhiko, aṃsiko;
anya-e1201n:942_9: sīsikoti-iko–-’vetanena jīvatī’ti vetaniko, bhatiko, kayiko, vikkayiko; kayavikkayayikoti-iko.
anya-e1201n:944_0: Catutthyantā saṃvattati asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti;’punabbhavāya saṃvattatī’ti ponobhaviko,
anya-e1201n:944_1: itthiyaṃ-ponobhavikā;’lokāya saṃvattatī’ti lokiko,’ suṭṭhu aggo’ti saggo,’saggāya
anya-e1201n:944_2: saṃvattatī’ti sovaggiko, sassāvैka tadaminādi pāṭhā–-’dhanāya saṃvattatī’ti dhaññaṃ-yo.
anya-e1201n:946_0: Pañcamyantā sambhutamāgatantietesvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’mātito sambhutamāgatanti vā’
anya-e1201n:946_2: sambhutaṃ’ thaññaṃ;’pitito sambhuto’ pettiyo, mātiyo, mattiyo; macco vā.
anya-e1201n:948_0: Sattamyantā vasatītvevamādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’rukkhamūle vasatī’ti rukkhamuliko,āraññiko,
anya-e1201n:948_1: sosāniko;’loke vidito’ lokiko;’catumahārājesu bhattā’ cātummahārājikā;;dvāre niyutto’
anya-e1201n:950_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃatthe ṇiko hoti;’saṅghassa idaṃ’ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ,
anya-e1201n:950_1: sakyaputtiko, nāthaputtiko, jenadattiko–-kiye-sakiyo, parakiyo; niye-attaniyaṃ;ke-sako, rājakaṃ, bhaddhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:952: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti;’kaccāyanassैdaṃ’ kaccāyanaṃ, vyākaraṇaṃ; sogataṃ, sāsanaṃ; māhisaṃ, maṃsādi.
anya-e1201n:954: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi idamiccasmiṃ atthe yo hoti;’gunnaṃ idaṃ’gabyaṃ, maṃsādi; kabyaṃ, dabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:956: Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa hoti;’pitubhātā’ petteyyo.
anya-e1201n:958: Mātito pitito ca tesaṃ bhaginīyaṃ cho hoti;’mātu bhagini’ mātucchā;’pitubhaginī’ pitucchā–-kathaṃ mātulotu?’Mātulāditvānī’ti nipātanā.
anya-e1201n:960: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitusvāmaho hoti;’mātumātā’ mātāmahī;’mātupitā’ mātāmaho;’pitumātā’ patāmahī;’pitupitā’ pitāmaho–-na yathāsaṃkhyaṃ paccekābhisambandhā.
anya-e1201n:962: Mātāpituhi hite reyyaṇa hoti; matteyyo, petteyyo.
anya-e1201n:964: Nindādīsvatthesu nāmasmā ko hoti; nindāyaṃ-muṇḍako, samaṇako; aññāte-’kassāyaṃ asso’ti assako–-
anya-e1201n:965_1: viya’ hatthiko, assako, balivaddako–-rasse-mānusako, rukkhako, pilakkhako–-dayāyaṃ-puttako,
anya-e1201n:967_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca, taṃ ce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’parimiyate’tene’ti
anya-e1201n:967_1: parimāṇaṃ–-’doṇo parimāṇamassa’ doṇiko, vīhi; khārasatiko, khārasahassiko, āsītiko,
anya-e1201n:969: Yādīhi paṭhamantehiasseti chaṭṭhatthettako hoti, taṃ ve paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’yaṃ paramāṇamassa yantakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ; āvatake-yāvatako, tāvatako.
anya-e1201n:971: Sabbato paṭhamantehi yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhatthe āvantu hoti, taṃ ve paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’sabbaṃ parimāṇamassa’ sabbāvantaṃ, yāvantaṃ, tāvantaṃ, etāvantaṃ.
anya-e1201n:973_0: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ratirīvarīvatakarittakā honti, taṃ ce paṭhamantaṃ
anya-e1201n:973_1: parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’kiṃ saṃkhyānaṃ parimāṇamesaṃ’ kati, ete; kiva, kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ–-rīvanto sabhāvato asaṃkhyo.
anya-e1201n:975: Tārakādīhi paṭhamantehiasseti chaṭṭhattheito hoti, te ve saṃjātā honti;’tārakāsaṃjātā assa’ tārakitaṃ, gaganaṃ; pupphīto, rukkho; pallavitā, latā.
anya-e1201n:977_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe mattohoti;’palaṃ ummānamassa’ palamattaṃ,’hattho
anya-e1201n:977_1: pamāṇamassa’ hatthamattaṃ,’sataṃ mānamassa’ satamattaṃ,’doṇo parimāṇamassa’ doṇamattaṃ–-abhedopavārā doṇotipi hoti.
anya-e1201n:979: Uddhamānavuttito asseti chaṭṭhatthe tagghā hotīmैtto ca; jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
anya-e1201n:981: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito ṇo hoti mattādayo ca; porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ, purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e1201n:983: Ubavitīhi avayavavuttīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ayo hoti;’ ubho aṃsā assa’ ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:985: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṃkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe ḍo hoti, sā ce saṃkhyā adhikā hoti, yadasminti taṃ ce sataṃ sahassaṃsata
anya-e1201n:986_0: Sahassaṃ vā hoti;’vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sate’ti vīsaṃsataṃ, ekavīsaṃsataṃ, sahassaṃ
anya-e1201n:986_3: sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā–-dasantāya-ekādasaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā–-saccutīsāsadasanteti
anya-e1201n:986_4: kiṃ?Chādhikā asmiṃ sate; adhiketi kiṃ? Pañcadasahīnā asmiṃ sate; asminti kiṃ? Vīsatyadhikā
anya-e1201n:986_5: etasmāsatā; satasahasseti kiṃ? Ekādasaadhikā assaṃ vīsatiyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:988_0: Chaṭṭhīyantāyekādasādikāya saṃkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā; sā saṃkhyāpūrīyateyenataṃ
anya-e1201n:988_1: pūraṇaṃ’ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo’ekādaso, ekādasamo; vīso, vīsatimo; tiṃso, tīṃsatimo; cattālīso, paññāso.
anya-e1201n:990: Chaṭṭhīyantāya paṃcādikāya saṃkhyāyakatismā ca mo hoti pūraṇatthe; pañcamo, sattamo, aṭṭhamo; katimo, katimī.
anya-e1201n:992: Satādikāya saṃkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya puraṇatthe mo hoti, satādinamicāntādeso; satimo, sahassimo.
anya-e1201n:994: Chasaddāṭṭhaṭṭhamāhonti tassa pūraṇatthe; chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo; itthīya-chaṭṭhi chaṭṭhami–-kathaṃ,dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthanti? Dutiyassa-catutthatatiyānanti-nipātanā.
anya-e1201n:996: Ekasmā asahāyatthe kaāki honti vā; ekako, ekāki, eko.
anya-e1201n:998_0: Vacchādīnaṃ sabhāvassa tanutte gamyamānetaro hoti; susuttassa tanutte-vacchataro;
anya-e1201n:1000: Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe ratararatamā hontī; kataro bhavataṃ devadatto; kataro bhavataṃ kaṭho; katamo bhavataṃ devadatto; katamo bhavataṃ kaṭho; bhāradvājānaṃ katamo’si brahme.
anya-e1201n:1002: Tatiyantā datte’bhidheye lैyā honti;’devenadatto; devalo; deviyo; brahmalo; brahmayo–-sivā-sīvalo; sīviyo; sissa dīgho.
anya-e1201n:1004_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ; na ca sabbe sabbato honti,añaññatra
anya-e1201n:1004_2: bhāvo’ nīlattaṃ, nīlatāti guṇo bhāvo–-’nīlassaguṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ, nīlatātī nīlaguṇajāti;
anya-e1201n:1004_3: gottaṃ gotāti, gojāti–-pācakattaṃ daṇḍittaṃ visāṇittaṃ rājapurisattanti kriyādisambandhittaṃ–-devadattatta
anya-e1201n:1004_5: vedanattanaṃ; jāyattanaṃ jārattanaṃ–-ṇya-ālasyaṃ brahmaññaṃ cāpalyaṃ nepuññaṃpesuññaṃ
anya-e1201n:1004_6: rajjaṃ ādhipaccaṃ dāyajjaṃ vesammaṃ; vesamanti keci, sakhyaṃ vāṇijjaṃ–-ṇeyya-soceyyaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1004_7: ādhipateyyaṃ–-ṇa-gāravaṃ pāṭavaṃ ajjavaṃ maddavaṃ–-iya-adhipatiyaṃ paṇḍitiyaṃ bahussutiyaṃnaggiyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1004_8: sūriyaṃ –-ṇiya-ālasiyaṃ kālusiyaṃ mandiyaṃ dakkhiyaṃ porohitiyaṃ veyyattiyaṃ–-kathaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1004_9: rāmaṇīyakanti-sakatthe kantāṇena siddhaṃ–-kammaṃ kriyā; tattha.’Alasassa kammaṃ’
anya-e1201n:1004_10: alasattaṃ, alasatā, alasattanaṃ; ālasyaṃ ālasiyaṃvā–-’sakatthe’ti. Sakatthe’pi yathābhuccaṃkāruññaṃ
anya-e1201n:1006: Chaṭṭhayantā vaddhā dāsā ca byo vāhoti bhāvakammesu; vaddhakhyaṃ, vaddhatā; dāsabyaṃ; dāsatā–-kathaṃ, vaddhavanti ṇe vāgamo.
anya-e1201n:1008: Chaṭṭhiyantā yuvasdā bhāvakammesunaṇa vā hoti, vassabo ca; yobbanaṃ; vātveva-yuvattaṃ, yuvatā.
anya-e1201n:1010: Aṇuādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi bhāve vā ime hoti; aṇimā; laghimā; mahimā;kasimā–-vātveva-aṇuttaṃ; aṇutā.
anya-e1201n:1012: Bhāvavācakā saddā tena nibbatte’bhidheye imo hoti;’pākena nibbattaṃ’ pākimaṃ; sekimaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1014_0: Atisaye vattamānato hontete paccayā;’atisayena pāpo’ pāpataro; pāpatamo, pāpissiko,
anya-e1201n:1016: Dutiyantā llappaccayo hoti nissitatthe;’vedanissitaṃ’ vedallaṃ;’ duṭhunissitaṃ’ duṭṭhullaṃ–-ille-saṅkhārillaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1018_0: Pakatiyā uttaramavatthantaraṃ vikāro–-chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre’vayave ca ṇādayohontibahulaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1018_1: ṇa-āyasaṃ, bandhanaṃ; odumbaraṃ, paṇṇaṃ; odumbaraṃ, bhasmaṃ; kāpātैṃ, maṃsaṃ; kāpotaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1018_2: satthi –-ṇika-kappāsikaṃ, vatthaṃ; ṇeyya-eṇeyyaṃ,maṃsaṃ; eṇeyyaṃ, satthi; koseyyaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1018_3: vatthaṃ–-maya-tiṇamayaṃ; dārumayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ; mattikāmayaṃ–-’aññasminti’. Gunnaṃkarīse’pi mayo; gomayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1020_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmājatuto vikāravayavesussaṇvā hoti;’jatuno vikāro’ jātussaṃjātumayaṃ–-“lopo“ti.
anya-e1201n:1020_1: Bahulaṃ paccayalopo’pi phalapupphamūlesuvikārāvayavesu;’ piyālassa phalāni’ piyālāni;’mallikāya
anya-e1201n:1022_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā samūhe kaṇṇaṇikā honti; gottappaccayantā kaṇa-rājaññakaṃ; mānussakaṃ–-ukkhādīhi-okkhakaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1022_1: oṭṭhakaṃ; orabbhakaṃ; rājakaṃ; rājaputtakaṃ; hatthikaṃ; dhenukaṃ–-ṇa-kākaṃ; bhikkhaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1024_0: Janādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi samūhe tā hoti; janatā; gajatā; bandhutā; gāmatā; sahāyatā;
anya-e1201n:1026: Chaṭṭhiyantā hite iyo hoti; upādāniyaṃ–-aññatrāpi’samānādैre sayito’ sodariyo.
anya-e1201n:1028: Chaṭṭhiyantehi cakkhuādīhi hite ssohoti; cakkhūssaṃ; āyussaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1030: Sattamyantā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇyyo hoti; sabbho; pārisajjo–-sādhūti-kusalo yoggo hito vā–-aññatrāpi-’rathaṃ vahantī’ti racchā.
anya-e1201n:1032: Sattamyantā kammasadadā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe niyaññā honti;’ kamme sādhu’ kammaniyaṃ; kammaññaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1034: Kathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe iko hoti; kathiko; dhammakathiko; saṅgāmiko; pavāsiko; upavāsiko.
anya-e1201n:1036: Pathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇeyyo hoti; pātheyyaṃ; sāpateyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1038: Dakkhiṇāsaddato arahatthe ṇeyyo hoti;’dakkhiṇaṃ arahatī’ti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e1201n:1040: Tumantato arahatthe rāyohoti; “ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetuṃ, jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetuṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetuṃ“.
anya-e1201n:1042_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthiti etesvatthesu mantu hoti;’gāmo ettha dese assa vā purisassa
anya-e1201n:1042_1: santīti’ gomā–-atthiti vattamānakālopādānato bhutāhi bhavissantīhi vā gohi na gomā.
anya-e1201n:1042_2: Kathaṃ gomā āsi gomā bhavissatīti? Tadāpi vattamānāhiyeva gohi gomā; āsi bhavissatīti
anya-e1201n:1043: Pahūte ca pasaṃsāyaṃ nindāyañcātisāyane niccayoge ca saṃsagge hontime mantuādayo.
anya-e1201n:1044_0: Goassoti-jātisaddānaṃ dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyā mantvā dayo nahonti; tathā guṇasaddānaṃ
anya-e1201n:1044_1: seto paṭoti; ye sattu guṇasaddānaṃ dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi tehi honteva–-budhimā
anya-e1201n:1044_2: rūpavā rasavā gandhavā essavā saddavā; rasīrasiko; rūpi rūpiko; gandhī gandhikoti.
anya-e1201n:1046: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvatthe vantu hoti; sīlavā; paññavā–-avaṇṇāti-kiṃ? Satimā; bandhumā.
anya-e1201n:1048_0: Daṇḍādīhi ikaī honti vā manttvatthe; bahulaṃ vidhānā kutovi dve honti; kutocekamekaṃva.
anya-e1201n:1048_1: Daṇḍako, daṇḍi, daṇḍavā; gandhiko, gandhī, gandhavā; rūpiko, rūpī, rūpavā–-uttamiṇeva
anya-e1201n:1048_2: dhanā iko () dhaniko; dhanī dhanavāñño –-asannitñatthā () atthiko atthi; aññatra atthavā
anya-e1201n:1049_0: –-Tadantā ca;() puññatthiko, puññatthi–-vaṇṇantā īyeva() brahmavaṇṇī devavaṇṇī–-hatthadantehi
anya-e1201n:1049_1: jātiyaṃ () hatthī; dantī; aññatra hatthavā; dantavā–-vaṇṇato brahmacārimhi; () vaṇṇī,
anya-e1201n:1049_2: buhmacārī; vaṇṇavāñño–-pokkharādito dese() pokkharaṇī uppalinī kumudinī bhisinī muḷālinī
anya-e1201n:1049_4: () nāviko; –-sukhadukkhā ī() sukha dukkhī–-(sikhādihī vā)() sikhi sikhāvā mālī makālāvā
anya-e1201n:1049_5: sīli sīlavā balī balavā –-balā bāhūrupubbā ca() bāhubalī; ūrubalī.
anya-e1201n:1051: Tapādito mantvatthe vā ssi hoti; tapassi, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī –-vātveva-yasavā.
anya-e1201n:1053: Mukhādīhi mantvattha ro hैoti; mukharo, susiro ūsaro, madhuro, kharo, kujaro, nagaro –-dantassu ca uttatadante () danturo.
anya-e1201n:1055: Tuṇḍiādīhi mantvatthe bho vā hoti; tuṇḍibho, sāḷibho,valibho, vātveva-tuṇḍimā.
anya-e1201n:1057: Saddhādīhi mantvatthe a hoti vā; sanddho, pañño; itthiyaṃ-saddhā; vātveva-paññavā.
anya-e1201n:1059: Tapā ṇo hoti mantvatthe; tāpaso; itthiyaṃ-tāpasī.
anya-e1201n:1060: Ālvāhijjhādīhi-. Abhijjhādīhi ālu hotimantvatthe; abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu–-vātveva-dayāvā.
anya-e1201n:1062: Picchādīhi ilo hoti cā mantvatthe; picchilo, picchavā; pheṇilo, pheṇavā; jaṭilo, jaṭāvā;–-kathaṃ vāvāloti? Nindāyamilassādilope “paro kvacī“ti.
anya-e1201n:1064: Sīlādihi vo hoti vā mैntvatthe; sīlavo, sīlavā; kesavo, kesavā–-aṇṇā niccaṃ;() aṇṇavo–-gāṇḍi rājīhi saññāyaṃ; () gāṇḍivaṃ, dhanu; rājivaṃ, paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1066: Etehi dvīhi vī hoti mantvatthe; māyāvi, medhāvī.
anya-e1201n:1068: Sasaddā āmyuvāmī hontissare’bhidheye mantvatthe;’samassatthiti’ sāmī, suvāmī.
anya-e1201n:1070: Lakkhīsaddāṇo hota mantvatthe; a cantassa; ṇakāro’va savo; lakkhaṇo.
anya-e1201n:1076: Mantvatthe imैyā honti bahulaṃ; puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo,hānabhāgiyo, seniyo.
anya-e1201n:1078: Pañcavyantā bahulaṃ to hoti vā; gāmato āgacchati, gāmasmāāgacchati; corato bhāyati, corehi bhāyati; satthatoparihīno, satthā parihīno.
anya-e1201n:1080: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭa eta kiṃsaddassa kuttaca; ito, imasmā; ato, etto, etasmā; kuto, kasmā.
anya-e1201n:1082: Abhiādīhi to hoti; abhito, parito, pacchato, heṭṭhato.
anya-e1201n:1084: Ādippabhutīhi to vā hoti; ādo, ādito; majjhato, antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato–-yatodakaṃ tadā dittaṃ, yaṃ udakaṃ tadevādittanti attho.
anya-e1201n:1086: Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tratthā vā honti; sabbatra, sabbattha, sabbasmiṃ; yatra, yattha, yasmiṃ–-bahulādhikārā na tumhāmhehi.
anya-e1201n:1088: Ete saddā nipaccante; kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva; etasmiṃ ettha, atra; asmiṃ iha, idha.
anya-e1201n:1090: Sattamyantato sabbasmādhi vā hoti; sabbadhi; sabbattha.
anya-e1201n:1092: Sattamyantā yato hiṃ vā hoti; yahiṃ, yatra.
anya-e1201n:1094: Sattamyantā tato vā haṃ hoti hiñca; tahaṃ, tahiṃ, tatra.
anya-e1201n:1096: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃhaṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca; kihiṃ, kahaṃ, kathaṃ kuhidvananti? Canaṃ iti nipātantaraṃ; kihidvīti-ettha visaddoviya.
anya-e1201n:1098: Etehi sattamyantehi cattamānehi kāle dā hoti; sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā; ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā–-kāleti-kiṃ? Sabbatthadese.
anya-e1201n:1100: Ete saddā nipaccante; tasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā; sambasmiṃ kāle sadā; imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e1201n:1102_0: Ete saddā nipaccante; ekatippaccayo ādeso kāla visesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati;
anya-e1201n:1102_1: imassa vo jjo cāhani nipaccate; asmiṃ ahani ajja–-samānassa sabhāvojju cāhani–-samāne
anya-e1201n:1102_2: abhani sajju–-aparasmā jju–-aparasmiṃ ahaniaparajju–-imassetokāle rahi va–-imasmiṃ
anya-e1201n:1102_3: kāle etarahi–-kiṃsaddassa ko raha cānajjatane–-tasmiṃ kāle karaha.
anya-e1201n:1104: Sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tattha vattamānehi sabbādīhi thā hoti sabbenapakārena sabbathā; yathā, tathā.
anya-e1201n:1106: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāre; kimimehi thaṃ paccayo, kैcca tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ; kathamitthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1108_0: Saṅkhyāvācīhi pakāre dhā paro hoti;’dvīhi pakārehi dve vā pakārekaroti’ vidhākaroti;
anya-e1201n:1108_1: bahudhā karoti;’ekaṃ rāsiṃ pañcappakāraṃ karoti’ pañcadhā karoti?Pañcappakāramekappakāraṃ
anya-e1201n:1110: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṃ vā hoti; ekajkvaṅkaroti; ekadhā karoti.
anya-e1201n:1112: Dvītihi pakāre edhāvā hoti; vedhā, tedhā; dvidhā, tidhā.
anya-e1201n:1114: Pakāravati taṃsāmaññavācakā saddājātiyo hoti; paṭu jātiyo, mudujātiyo.
anya-e1201n:1116: Vārasambandhiniyā saṃkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti;’dve vāre bhuñjati’ dvikkhattuṃ divasassa bhuñjati; vāraggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Pañaca bhiñjati; saṅkhyāyāti-kiṃ? Pahūte vāre bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1118: Vārasambandhiniyā katisaṃkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti;’kati vāre bhuñjani’katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1120: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṃkhyāya dhāhoti kkhattuñca; vārānañce paccāsatti hoti; bahudhā divasassa buñjati bahukkhattuṃ–-paccāsattiyanti kiṃ? Bahukkhattuṃ māsassa bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1122: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate;’ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjati’–-vāti kiṃ?Ekakkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1124: Vīcchāyaṃ pakāre ca so hoti bahulaṃ; vīcchāyaṃ-khaṇḍaso, bilaso; pakāre-puthuso,sabbaso.
anya-e1201n:1126_0: Avatthāvato vatthantarenābhutassa tāyāvatthāya bhāve karāsabhuhi sambandhesati vikāravācakācī
anya-e1201n:1126_1: hoti;’adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti’ dhavalī karoti; adhavalo dhavalo siyā dhavalī siyā;
anya-e1201n:1126_2: adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalī bhavati–-abhatatabbhāveti-kiṃ? Ghaṭaṃ karoti, dadhiatthi,
anya-e1201n:1126_3: ghaṭo bhavati–-karāsabhuyogeti kiṃ? Adhavalā dhvaailo jāyate–-vikārāti-kiṃ? Pakatiyā
anya-e1201n:1128_0: Vuttato’ññe’pi paccayā dissanti vuttāvuttatthesu;’vividhā mātaro’ vimātaro,’tāsaṃ
anya-e1201n:1128_1: puttā’ vemātīkā-rikaṇa;’pathaṃ gacchantīti’ pathāvino-āvī;’ issā assa atthiti’ issukī-ukī?’Dhuraṃ
anya-e1201n:1130: Vuttato’ññasmimpi atthe vuttappaccayā dissanti;’magadhānaṃ issaro’ māgadho-ṇo;’kāsīti sahassaṃ, tamagghatīti kāsiyo-iyo.
anya-e1201n:1132: Sakatthe’pi paccayā dissanti; hīnako, potako, kicacayayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1134: Paccayānaṃ lopo’pi dissati; buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyeyana vāti bhāvappaccaya lopo.
anya-e1201n:1136: Sarānamādibhutā ye akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇā tesaṃ āño honti yathākkamaṃ ṇānubandhe; rāghavo, vैnateyyo, meniko, oḷumpiko, dohaggaṃ–-ṇānubandheti-kiṃ? Purātano.
anya-e1201n:1138: Sarānamādibhutā ye ayuvaṇṇā tesaṃ āño honti kvaci deva saṃyogavisaye ṇānubandhe;decco, koṇḍañño –-kvacīti-kiṃ? Kattikeyyo.
anya-e1201n:1140: Majjhe vattamānānampi ayuvaṇṇānaṃ āño honti kvaci; aḍḍhateyyā, vāseṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1142_0: Ete saddā nipaccante ṇānubandhe;’kusītassa bhāvo’ kosajjajaṃ;’ ujuno bhāvo’ appavaṃ;’parisāsu
anya-e1201n:1142_1: sādhu’ pārisajjo;’suhadayoca’ suhajjo,’tassa pana bhāvo sohajjaṃ;’muduno bhāvo’maddavaṃ;’isino
anya-e1201n:1142_2: idaṃ, bhāvo vā’ ārissaṃ;’usabhassa idaṃ, bhāvo vā’ āsabhaṃ;’ājānīyassa bhāvo’ so
anya-e1201n:1142_3: eva vā’ ājaññaṃ;’thenassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā’ theyyaṃ;’bahussutassa bhāvo’ bāhusaccaṃ–-etesu
anya-e1201n:1144: Manādīnaṃ saka hoti ṇānubandhe;’manasi bhavaṃ’ mānasaṃ;’dummanaso bhāvo’ domanassaṃ; somanassaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1147: Yakārādo paccaya gैossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅi hoti; gabyaṃ, gātabyo.
anya-e1201n:1149: Yakārādo paccaye avaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ lāpo hoti, dāyjैjaṃ, kāruññaṃ, ādhipaccaṃ, deppaṃ–-bahakulaṃvidhānaṃ kvaci na hoti; kiccayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1151: Anto saro ādi yassāvayavassa tassa lopo hoti rānubandhe; kittakaṃ, petteyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1153: Kisassa mahato ime kasmahā honti yathākkamaṃ; kasimā, mahimā.
anya-e1201n:1157: Vuddhassa jo hoti iyैṭṭhesu; jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1159: Iyeṭṭhesu bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādhanedasā hontī yathākkamaṃ; sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho; nediyo, nediṭṭho; seyyo, seṭṭho
anya-e1201n:1161: Iyeṭṭhesu appayuvānaṃ kaṇkanā honti yayathākkamaṃ; kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho; kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1163: Vīmantuvantunaṃ lopo hoti iyैṭṭhesu?’Atisayena medhāvī’ medhiyo, medhiṭṭho;’atisayenasatimā’satiyo, satiṭṭho;’atisayena guṇavā’ guṇiyā, guṇiṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1165: Se pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti; vīsaṃ sataṃ, tiṃsaṃ sataṃ.
anya-e1201n:1167: Ttake pare etassa eṭa henāti; ettakaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1171_0: Ghe pare adhātussa yo kakāro tato pubbassa akārassa bakahulaṃ i hoti, save ghona
anya-e1201n:1171_1: syādito paro hoti; bālikā, kārikā–-adhātussāti-kiṃ? Sakā; keti-kiṃ?Nandanā; asyāditoti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1171_2: Bahuparibbājakā, madhurā –-bahucammikāti kakārena syādino byavahitattā siddhaṃ–-gheti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1172: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ ṇādikaṇḍo catuttho.
anya-e1201n:1174: Khantiyaṃ tijā vīmaṃsāyaṃ mānā ca khasappaccayā honti yathākkamaṃ; titikkhā, vīmaṃsā–-titikkhati, vīmaṃsati. Khamāvīmaṃsā suti-kiṃ? Tejanaṃ, tejo, tejayati, mānanaṃ, māno, māneti.
anya-e1201n:1176: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā jo hoti–-tikicchā, vicikicchā–-tikicchati, vicikicchati–-aññatraniketo, saṃketo, ketanaṃ, keto, ketayati.
anya-e1201n:1178: Nindāyaṃ vattamānehi gupabadhehi jo hoti; bassa bho ca–-jigucchā, bībhacchā–-jigucchati, bībhacchati–-aññatragopanaṃ, gope, popeti, badhako.
anya-e1201n:1180_0: Tumantato icchāyamatthe te khasachā hontibahakulaṃ; lopo ca tuṃpaccayassahoti sutattā–-bubhukkhā,
anya-e1201n:1180_1: jigiṃsā, jighacchā–-bubhukkhati, jigiṃsati, jighacchati–-idhakasmā na hotibhottumicchatīti?
anya-e1201n:1180_2: Padantarenābhidhānā. Tuṃsmāti-kiṃ? Bhojanamicchati. Icchāyanti kiṃ? Bhuñjituṃ gacchati.
anya-e1201n:1180_3: Kathaṃ kulaṃ pipatisatīti? Yathā kulaṃ patitumicchatītivākyaṃ hoti, evaṃ vuttipi
anya-e1201n:1180_4: hessati; vākyamevacarahi kathaṃ hoti? Lokassa tathā vacanicchāya.
anya-e1201n:1182_1: Aasinecchati; idha kasmā na hoti rañño puttamicchatīti? Sāpekkhattā; na hi aññamapekkhamāno
anya-e1201n:1182_2: aññenasahekatthibhāvamanubhavituṃ sakkoti; idhāpi carahi na siyā attanoputtamicchatīti;
anya-e1201n:1182_3: nevettha bhavitabbaṃ; na hi bhavati attanoputtiyatīti; kathaṃ carahi vuttassa attatiyatāvagamyate?
anya-e1201n:1184: Kammato upamānā āvāratthe īyo hoti;’puttamavā carati’ puttīyati māṇavakaṃ; upamānāti kiṃ? Puttamācarati.
anya-e1201n:1186: Ādhāratupamānāāvāratthe īyo hoti;’kuṭiyamivācarati’ kuṭiyati pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1190: Kattuto abhutatabbhāve āyo hoti bahulaṃ; bhusāyati, paṭapaṭāyati, lohitāyati–-kattutotveva-bhusaṃkarotīti; iha kasmā na hoti bhusi bhavatīti? Vuttatthatāya.
anya-e1201n:1192: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti; saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.
anya-e1201n:1194: Namo iccasmā karotīti asmiṃ atthe asso hoti; namassati tathāgataṃ.
anya-e1201n:1196_0: Nāmasmā dhātvatthe bahulami hoti;’hatthinā atikkamati’ati hatthayati;’ vīṇāya upagāyati’
anya-e1201n:1196_1: upavīṇayati;’daḷahaṃ karoti’ vinayaṃ daḷahayati;’ visuddhā hoti’ ratti visuddhayati;’kusalaṃ
anya-e1201n:1198: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti; saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1200: Ayamadhikāro ā satthaparisamattiyā;’kriyā attho yassaso kriyattho’,dhātu.
anya-e1201n:1202: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṃ; ṇakāro vuddhyattho–-evamaññatrāpi–-corayati, lāḷayati. Kathaṃ rajjaṃ kāretīti? Yogavibhāgato.
anya-e1201n:1204_0: Kattāraṃ yo payojayati tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṃ; kāreti, kārāpeti–-nanu
anya-e1201n:1204_1: ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṃpayojakoti tabyāpāre?Pi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti? Payojakaggahaṇasāmatthiyā
anya-e1201n:1204_2: na bhavissanti, curādīhi visuṃ vacanasāmatthiyā ca–-āto bhiyyo ṇāpiyeva, ṇiye vuvaṇṇato, dvayamevaññehi.
anya-e1201n:1206_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu mānantatyādisu paresukyo hoti krayatthā–-ntaggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1206_1: kakāro avuddhyattho; evamuttaratrāpi–-ṭhiyamānaṃ, ṭhiyate; sūyamānaṃ, sūyate–-aparokkhesūti-kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1206_2: Babhuva devadattena; bibhida kusūlo. Bhijjate kusūlo sayamevātibhijjateti savanā
anya-e1201n:1206_5: ā“tanāditvo“apivaete tyādayo tyādisu parabhutesu kattukammabhāvavihitesu kyalādīnaṃ
anya-e1201n:1206_6: vidhānato tesveva viññayantīti-akammakehi dhātuhi kattubhāvesu sakammakehi kattukammesukammāvacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1206_7: bhāveva bhavantīti veditabbā–-yassapanadhātussa kriyā kammamapekkhate sosakammako?
anya-e1201n:1206_8: Yassa tu kriyā kattumattamapekkhate so akammakoti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1209: Kriyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvitamānantatyādisu lo hoti; lakāro “ñilasse’ti. Visesanattho–-pacamāno, pacanto; pavati.
anya-e1201n:1211: Rudhādito kattuvihitamānādisu lo hoti; maṃ vānta sarā paro; makāro’nubandho; akāro uccāraṇatvo–-rundhamāno, rundhanto, rundhati.
anya-e1201n:1213_0: Ṇiṇāpyāphīhi kattuvihitamānādisu lo hoti vibhāsā; corayanto, corento; kārayantā,
anya-e1201n:1213_1: kārento; kārāpैyanto, kārāpento; saccāpayanto, saccāpento; corayati, coreti; kārayati,
anya-e1201n:1213_2: kāreti; kārāpayati, kārāpeti; saccāpayati, saccāpeti–-vacatthitavibhāsattho’yaṃ vā
anya-e1201n:1213_3: saddo; tena māne niccaṃ; corayamāno, kārayamāno, kārāpayamāno, saccāpayamāno.
anya-e1201n:1215: Divādīhi lavīsaye yaka hoti; dibbanto; dibbati.
anya-e1201n:1217: Tudādīhi lavīsaye ko hoti; tudamāno, tudanto; kudati.
anya-e1201n:1219: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti; jinanto, jināti–-kathaṃ jayanto, jayatīni? Bhuvādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1221: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti; kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
anya-e1201n:1223: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti; suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti; kathaṃ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1227: Tabbaanīyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulambhavanti; kattabbaṃ, karaṇīyaṃ; kattabbo kaṭo; karaṇīyo–-bahulā
anya-e1201n:1228: Dhikārā karaṇādisupi bhavanti–-sinānīyaṃ, cuṇṇaṃ; dānīyo, brāhmaṇo; samāvattanīyo, guru; pavacanīyo, upajjhāyo; upaṭṭhānīyo, sisso.
anya-e1201n:1230: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ; vākyaṃ, kāriyaṃ, veyyaṃ, jeyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1232: Āto ghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu āssa e ca; deyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1234: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulamhāvakammesu; vajjaṃ, majjaṃ, gammaṃ–-bhujānte () bhojjo, odano; bhojjā, yāgu; bhoggamaññaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1238_0: Guhādīhi kriyatthehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti; guyhaṃ, duyhaṃ, sisso; siddhā evete
anya-e1201n:1238_1: tabbādayo pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññena vidhānato–-hotā khalu kaṭo
anya-e1201n:1238_2: kattabbo, karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco-evaṃ tvayā kaṭo kattabbo; hotā kaṭo kattabbo, hoto
anya-e1201n:1238_3: hi patto kālo kaṭakaraṇe–-evaṃ uddhamuhuttike’pi vattamānato pesādisu siddhā eva–-tathā
anya-e1201n:1238_4: arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamiṇatāvisiṭṭheva bhāvādo siddhā–-uddha
anya-e1201n:1238_5: muhuttikato-bhotā kaṭo kattabbo; bhotā rajjaṃ kātabbaṃ, bhavaṃ araho; bhotā bhāro
anya-e1201n:1238_6: vahitabbo, bhavaṃ satto; bhotā avassaṃ kaṭo kattabbo; bhotā nikkho dātabbo.
anya-e1201n:1240_0: Kattari kārake kriyatthā latuṇakā bhontī; paṭhitā, pāṭhako–-bahulamitveva-pādehi
anya-e1201n:1240_1: harīyatī’ti pādahārake;’galecuppatī’ti galecopako–-saddho eva latuarahe sīlasādhu
anya-e1201n:1240_2: dhammesu ca sāmaññavihitatattā; bhavaṃ balu kaññāya pariggayitā, bhavametaṃ arahati;
anya-e1201n:1240_3: sīlādisu-khalvapi upādātā kumārake; gantākhelo; muṇḍayitāro sāviṭṭhāyanā vadhuṃ kataparigahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1242: Kriyayatthā āvī hoti bahulaṃ kattari; bhayadassāvī–-appavīsayatāñāpanatthaṃ bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ; sāmaññavihitattā sīlādisu ca hoteva.
anya-e1201n:1243: Āsiṃsāyamako-. Āsiṃsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari;’jīvatuti’ jīvako; nandatuti’ nandako;’bhavatuti’ bhavako.
anya-e1201n:1245: Karato kattari ṇano hoti;’karotī’ti kāraṇaṃ; kattarīti-kiṃ? Karaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1247: Hāto vīhisiṃ kāle caṇano hotī kattari; hāyanā nāma vīhayo; hāyano saṃvaccharo; vīhikālesūti - kiṃ? Hātā.
anya-e1201n:1249: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari; vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e1201n:1251: Vipubbā ñāiccasmā ku hoti kattari; viñña; vitoti-kiṃ? Pañño.
anya-e1201n:1253: Kammato parā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari; sabbañña, kālañña.
anya-e1201n:1255_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari; kumbhakāro, saralāvo, mavtajjhāyo–-bahakulādhikārā
anya-e1201n:1255_1: iha na hoti, ādiccaṃ passati, himavantaṃ suṇoti, gāmaṃ gacchati. Kvacīti kiṃ? Kammakaro.
anya-e1201n:1257: Kammato paraṃ gamā rū hoti kattari; vedagu, pāragu.
anya-e1201n:1259_0: Samānādīhi yādīhicopamānehi parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti;’ samāno viya
anya-e1201n:1259_1: dissatī’ti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso; aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso; bhavādī, bhavādikkho,
anya-e1201n:1259_2: bhavādiso; yādī, yādikkho, yādiso; tyādī, tyyādikkho, tyādiso –-samānādīhīti kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1259_3: Rukkho viya dissati. Upamānāti kiṃ? So dissati kammeti kiṃ? So viya passatī–-rakārā
anya-e1201n:1261_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aghaṇghakā honti bahakulaṃ; apaggaho, niggaho, karo, garo,
anya-e1201n:1261_1: cayo, jayo, ravo, bhavo, paco, vaco, annado, purindado, īsakkaro, dukkaro, sukaro–-ghaṇa-bhāve-pāko-
anya-e1201n:1261_2: vāgo, bhāvo. Kārake’pi saññāyaṃ tāva-’pajjate’nene’ti pādo;’rujatī’ti rogo;’vīsatīti
anya-e1201n:1261_3: veso;’sarati kālantara’nti sāro, thirattho;’darīyante etebhī’ti dārā;’jīrayati etenā’ti
anya-e1201n:1261_4: jāro–-asaññāyampi-dāyo, datto; lābho, laddho–-gha-vakonipako–-ka-piyo, khipo, bhujo, āyudhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1263: Dādhāhi bahulami hotibhāvakārakesu; ādi, nidhi. Vāladhi.
anya-e1201n:1267: Kriyatthā kvi hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakārakesu–-kakāro kānu bandhakāriyattho–-abhibhu, sayambhu, bhattaggaṃ, salākaggaṃ, sabhā, pabhā.
anya-e1201n:1269: Kriyatthā bhāvakārakesvano hoti; gamanaṃ, dānaṃ, sampadānaṃ, apādānaṃ, adhikaraṇaṃ, calano, jalano, kodhano, kopano, maṇḍano, bhusano.
anya-e1201n:1271_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honta no ca bahulaṃ–-a-titikkhā. Vīmaṃsā,
anya-e1201n:1271_1: jigucchā, pipāsā, puttīyā, īhā, bhikkhā, āpadā, medhā, godhā–-ṇa-kārā, hārā, tārā,
anya-e1201n:1271_2: dhārā, ārā–-kti-iṭṭhi, siṭṭhi, bhitti, bhatti, tanti, bhuti –-ka- uhā, rujā, mudā,–-yaka-vijjā,
anya-e1201n:1271_3: ijjā–-ya-seyyā, samajjā, pabbajjā, paricariyā, jāgariyā–-ana-kāraṇā, hāraṇā, vedanā, vandanā, upāsanā.
anya-e1201n:1273: Jāhā iccetehi ni hotitthiyaṃ; jāni, hāni.
anya-e1201n:1275: Karato ririyo hotitthiyaṃ;’karaṇaṃ’ kiriyā–-kathaṃ kriyāti?’Kriyāya’nti nipātanā.
anya-e1201n:1277: Kriyatthassa sarūpe’bhidheye kriyatthā pare ikitī honti; vaci, yudhi. Pacati.–-Akāro kakārotiādisu kārasaddena samāso, yathā evakāroti.
anya-e1201n:1279: Kriyatthā ṇī hoti sīlādisu patīyamānesu; uṇhabhoji, khīrapāyī, avassakārī, satatdāyī.
anya-e1201n:1283: Bhutatthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantuktāvī hontī kattari; vijitavā, vijitāvī; bhuteti adhikāro yāva āhāratthāti.
anya-e1201n:1285: Bhāve kamme ca bhute kto hoti; āsitaṃ bhavatā; kato kaṭo bhavatā.
anya-e1201n:1287: Kriyārambhe kattari kto hota, yathāpattañca; pakato bhavaṃ kaṭaṃ; pakato kaṭo bhavatā; pasutto bhavaṃ; pasuttaṃ bhavatā.
anya-e1201n:1289_0: Ṭhādīhi kattari kto hoti yathāpattañca; upaṭṭhito gurumbhavaṃ, upaṭṭhito guru bhotā;
anya-e1201n:1289_1: upāsito gurumbhavaṃ, upāsito guru bhotā; anuvusito gurumbhavaṃ, anuvusito guru bhotā;
anya-e1201n:1290_0: Adhisayito khaṭopikaṃ bhavaṃ, adhisayitā khaṭopikā bhotā; āruḷho rukkhaṃ bhavaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1290_1: āruḷho rukkho bhātā; anujiṇṇo vasaliṃ devadatto, anujiṇṇā vasalī devadattena; anujāto
anya-e1201n:1292_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca; idamesaṃ
anya-e1201n:1292_1: yātaṃ, iha te yātaṃ, ihatehi yātaṃ, ayaṃ tehi yāto patho, idamesamāsitaṃ, iha te
anya-e1201n:1292_2: āsitā, iha tehi āsitaṃ, devo ce vaṭṭho sampannā sālayoti -kāraṇa sāmaggisampatti etthābhimatā.
anya-e1201n:1294_0: Ajjhohāratthā ādhāre kto hoti yathāpattañca; idamesaṃ bhuttaṃ, idamesaṃ pītaṃ, iha
anya-e1201n:1294_1: tehi bhuttaṃ, iha tehi pītaṃ, odano tehi bhutto, pītamudakaṃ–-akattattho yogavibhāgo;
anya-e1201n:1294_2: kathaṃ pītā gāvoti?’Pītamesaṃ vijjatī’tipītā?Bāhulakā vā–-passinnoti yā ettha bhutakālatā
anya-e1201n:1294_3: tanra kto; evaṃ raññammato, raññamiṭṭho,raññambuddho, raññaṃ pūjito–-evaṃ sīlito,
anya-e1201n:1294_4: rakkhito, khanto, ākuṭṭho, ruṭṭho, rusito, abhivyāhaṭo, dayito, haṭṭho, kanto, saṃyato,amato–-kaṭṭhanti
anya-e1201n:1296_0: Bhavissatiatthe vattamānato krayatthā bhāve tuṃtāye tave honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1296_1: patīyamānāyaṃ; kātuṃ gacchati; kattāye gacchati; kātave gacchati–-icchati bhottuṃ
anya-e1201n:1296_2: kāmeti bhottunti imināva siddhaṃpunabbidhānetvihāpi siyā icchanto karotīti–-evaṃ
anya-e1201n:1296_3: sakkotibhottuṃ, jānāti bhottuṃ, gilāyati bhottuṃ, ghaṭate bhottuṃ, ārabhate bhottuṃ,
anya-e1201n:1296_4: labhate bhottuṃ, pakkamati bhottuṃ, ussahatī bhontuṃ, arahati bhottuṃ, atthi bhottuṃ,
anya-e1201n:1296_5: vijjati bhottuṃ, vaṭṭati bhottuṃ, kappati bhottunti–-tathā pārayati bhottuṃ, pahu
anya-e1201n:1296_6: bhottuṃ, samattho bhottuṃ, pariyatto bhottuṃ, alaṃ bhottunti; bhavatissa sabbattha
anya-e1201n:1296_7: sambhavā–-tathā kālo bhottuṃ, samayo bhottuṃ, velā bhottunti–-yathā-bhottumano, sotuṃ
anya-e1201n:1296_8: soto, daṭṭhuṃ cakkhu. Yujjhituṃ dhanu, vattu jaḷo, gantuṃ mano, kattumalasoti–-uccāraṇantu
anya-e1201n:1296_9: vattāyattaṃ–-bhāveti kiṃ? Karissāmiti gacchati; kriyāyanti kiṃ? Bhikkhissaṃ iccassa
anya-e1201n:1296_10: jaṭā; tadatthāyanti kiṃ gacchissato te bhavissati bhattaṃ bhojanāya.
anya-e1201n:1298_0: Alaṃkhalusaddānaṃ paṭisedhatthānaṃpayoge tunādayo vā honti bhāve; alaṃ sotuna, khalu
anya-e1201n:1298_1: sotuna; alaṃ sutvāna, khalu sutvāna; alaṃ sutvā, khalu sutvā; laṃ sutena, khalu sutena–-alaṃ
anya-e1201n:1298_2: khalūnanti kiṃ? Mā hotu; paṭisedheti kiṃ? Alaṃkāro.
anya-e1201n:1300_0: Eko kattā yesaṃ vyāpārānaṃ tesuyo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā tunādayo honti bhāve;
anya-e1201n:1300_1: sotuna yāti, sutvāna, sutvāvā–-ekakattukānanti kiṃ bhuttasmiṃ devadatte yaññadatto
anya-e1201n:1300_2: vajati; pubbāti kiṃ? Bhuñjati ca pacati ca–-appattvā nadiṃ pabbato, atikkamma pabbataṃ
anya-e1201n:1300_3: nadīti bhudhātussa sabbattha sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate. Bhutvā
anya-e1201n:1300_4: bhutvā gacchatīti imināva siddhamābhikkhaññantu dibbacanāvagamyate–-kathaṃ jīvagāhaṃ
anya-e1201n:1300_5: agāhasi, kāyappacālakaṃ gacchantītiādi? Ghaṇantena kriyāvisesanena siddhaṃ; yathā
anya-e1201n:1302: Cattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā nto hoti kattari; tiṭṭhanto.
anya-e1201n:1304: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā māno hoti kattari; tiṭṭhamāno.
anya-e1201n:1306: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve kamme ca māno hoti; ṭhīyamānaṃ, paccamāno odano.
anya-e1201n:1308: Anāgatatthe vattamānato kriyanthā te ntamānā ssapubbā honti; ṭhassanto, ṭhassamāno, ṭhisissamānaṃ, paccassamāno odano.
anya-e1201n:1310: Kriyatthā pare bahakulaṃ ṇvādayo honti; cāru, dāru.
anya-e1201n:1312: Khachasappaccayantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ paṭhamamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati; titikkhā, jigucchā, vīmaṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1314: Parokkhāyaṃ paṭhamamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati; jagāma–-cakāro avuttasamuccayattho; tenaññatrāpi yathāgamaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1315: Jahāti, jahitabbaṃ, jahituṃ, daddallati, vaṅkamati–-lolupo, momuhoti ottaṃ’tadaminādi’ pāsā.
anya-e1201n:1317: Ādibhutā sarā paramekassaraṃ dve hoti; asisisati–-ādismāti kiṃ? Jajāgāra; sarāti kiṃ? Papāca.
anya-e1201n:1319: Gaṃ dvibhutaṃ na taṃ puna dvattamāpajjate; titikkhasati, jigucchisati.
anya-e1201n:1321: Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhamekassaramādibhutamaññaṃ vā yathāgamaṃ dvittamāpajjate; puputtiyisati, putittīyisatī, puttīyiyisati.
anya-e1201n:1327: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu; pipāsati–-khacha sesūti kiṃ? Jahāti; assāti kiṃ? Bubhukkhati.
anya-e1201n:1329: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu; jigucchati.
anya-e1201n:1331: Dvitte pubbesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti; bubhukkhati. Ciccheda.
anya-e1201n:1333: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavaggahānaṃ vavaggajāhonti yathā kkamaṃ; cukopa, jahāti.
anya-e1201n:1335: Dvitte pubbassamānassa vī hoti, parassaca maṃ; vīmaṃsati.
anya-e1201n:1337: Saṃsayato’ññasmiṃ cattamānassadvitte pubbassa kitassavāti hoti; tikicchati. Cikicchati–-asaṃsayeti kiṃ? Vicikicchati.
anya-e1201n:1339: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ ño honti yathākkamaṃ paccaye; cetabbaṃ, netabbaṃ, sotabbaṃ, bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1341: Lahubhutassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa ño honti yathākkamaṃ; esitabbaṃ, kositabbaṃ–-lahussātikiṃ? Dhūpitā; upantassāti-kiṃ? Rundhati.
anya-e1201n:1343: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa āhoti; kārako.
anya-e1201n:1345_0: Te ñoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti; cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho–-nāgame vanādinā.
anya-e1201n:1345_1: –-Cinitabbaṃ, vinituṃ; suṇitabbaṃ, suṇituṃ; pāpuṇitabbaṃ, pāpuṇituṃ; dhunitabbaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1345_2: dhunituṃ, dhunanaṃ, dhunayitabbaṃ, dhunāpetabbaṃ, dhunayituṃ,dhunāpetuṃ, dhunayanaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1345_3: dhunāpanaṃ, dhunayati, dhunāpeti; pīnetabbaṃ, pīnayituṃ, pīnanaṃ, pīnituṃ, pīnayati;
anya-e1201n:1345_4: sunoti; sinoti; dunoti; hinoti; pahiṇitabbaṃ, pahiṇituṃ, pahiṇanaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1347: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu; mudito modito; ruditaṃ, roditaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1349: Kānubandhanāgamato’ññasmimpi te kvaci na honti; khipako, panudanaṃ, vadhako.
anya-e1201n:1353: Sare pare ñonamayavā honti; jayo, bhavo–-sareti kiṃ? Jeti; anubhoti.
anya-e1201n:1355: Ñonamāyāvā honti sarādoṇānubandhe; nāyayati, bhāvayati. Sayāpetvātiādisurassattaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1357: Ākārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇāpito’ññasmiṃ ṇānubandhe; dāyako–-ṇānubandhetveva? Dānaṃ. Aṇāpimhīti kiṃ? Dāpayati.
anya-e1201n:1359: Padādīnaṃ yuka hoti kvaci; nipajjitabbaṃ, nipajjituṃ, nipajjanaṃ, pamajjitabbaṃ, pamajjituṃ, pamajjanaṃ–-kvacīti kiṃ? Pādo.
anya-e1201n:1361: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti; rundhituṃ, rujjhituṃ–-kvacitveva? Nirodho.
anya-e1201n:1363: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvamhi;’bhattaṃ ghasanti, gaṇhanti vāetthā’ti bhattaggaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1365: Kriyatthānamantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato’ññasmiṃ byañjane; hettabbaṃ; byañjaneti kiṃ? Bhinditabbaṃ. Ayakāreti kiṃ? Bhijjati.
anya-e1201n:1367: Makāranakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ niggahītaṃ hotayayakāre byañjane; gantabbaṃ, jaṅghā. Byañjanetveva? Gamanaṃ; aya kāretveva? Gamyate.
anya-e1201n:1369: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane; brūmi. Byañjanetveva? Abravi.
anya-e1201n:1371: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamaṃ; vākyaṃ, bhāgyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1375: Paṭhyādīhi parassahanassagho hoti kvimhi; paligho, paṭigho, aghaṃ-rassattaṃ nipātanā;saṅgho, ogho.
anya-e1201n:1377: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se; jighaṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1379: Dvitte paresaṃ jiharānaṃ giṃ hoti se; vijigiṃsā, jigiṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1381: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti; dahati.
anya-e1201n:1383: Dusassadīgho hoti ṇimhī; dūsito–-ṇimhīti kiṃ? Duṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1385: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare; niguhanaṃ–-sareti kiṃ? Guyhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1387_0: Muhabahānaṃ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhetvānatvāvajjite; mūḷho, bāḷehā,
anya-e1201n:1387_1: guḷho–-neti kiṃ? Muyahati. Kānubandheti kiṃ? Mu-hitabbaṃ. Atveti kiṃ? Muyhitvāna,
anya-e1201n:1389: Vahassौssa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite; cūḷho.
anya-e1201n:1391: Dhā dhāraṇenimassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvā vajjite; nihito, nihitavā.
anya-e1201n:1393_0: Hamādīnaṃ rakārantānaṃ vāntassalopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite; gato, khato,
anya-e1201n:1393_1: hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato–-tetveca? Gamyate. Kānubandhetveva. Gantabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1395: Vacādīnaṃ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe’tve; uttā, vuttaṃ; utthaṃ, vutthaṃ; atvetveva? Vatvāna, vatvā.
anya-e1201n:1397: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe’tve; vuttaṃ, vutthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1399: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe’tve; vuddho, vaddho–-atvetvava? Vaddhitvāna; vaddhitvā. Kathaṃ vuttīti?’Vutti matte’ti. Nipātanā; vattīti hoteva yathālakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1401: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī hontī kānubandhe’tve; iṭṭhaṃ, siṭṭhaṃ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
anya-e1201n:1403: Ṭhāssi hoti kānubandhe’tve; ṭhito. Atvetveva? Ṭhatvāna, ṭhatvā.
anya-e1201n:1404: Gāpānami hoti kānubandhe’tve; gītaṃ, pītaṃ. Atvetveva? Gāyitvā; niccaṃ yāgamo; pāssa tu pītvāni bahulādhikārā.
anya-e1201n:1406: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe’tve; jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
anya-e1201n:1408: Sāsassa vā sishoti kānubandhe’tve; siṭṭhaṃ, satthaṃ; sisso, sāsiyo. Atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
anya-e1201n:1412: Tumādisu vā karassā hoti; kātuṃ, kattuṃ, kātuna, kattuna; kātabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1414: Ñadhātussa jā hoti nakāre; jānituṃ, jānatto. Neti kiṃ? Ñāto.
anya-e1201n:1416: Sakaāpānaṃ kukku iccete āgamā honti ṇakāre. Sakkuṇanto, pāpuṇanto; sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti. Ṇeti kiṃ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1418: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti; nicchayo.
anya-e1201n:1420_0: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā; jīraṇā, jīrati, jīrāpeti; nisīditabbaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1420_1: nisīdanaṃ, nisīdituṃ, nisīdati–-vāti kiṃ? Jarā, nisajjā;’īma veti yogavibhāgā aññesampi?Abhiratha,
anya-e1201n:1422_0: Disassa passādayo honti vibhāsā; vipassanā, vipassituṃ, vipassati; sudassī, piyadassī,
anya-e1201n:1422_1: dhammadassī, sudassaṃ, dassanaṃ, dasseti; daṭṭhabbaṃ, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṃ, duddaso, addasa;
anya-e1201n:1422_2: addā, addaṃ; addakkhi, dakkhissati–-vātveva? Dissanti bālā.
anya-e1201n:1424: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīrikkhakesu; sarī, sadī; sarikkho, sadikkho; sariso, sadiso.
anya-e1201n:1426: Dahassa dassaḍo hoti vā; ḍānehā, dāho; ḍahati, dahati.
anya-e1201n:1428: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hotanaghaṇsu; āṇāhanaṃ, pariḷāho.
anya-e1201n:1430: Tyādinnavajjitesu paccayesu asa bhuviccassa bhu hoti; bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1431: Ādesavidhānamasassāppayogatthametasmiṃ visaye–-etena katthaci kassaci dhātussāppayogo’pi ñāpito hoti–-atyādintesūti kiṃ? Atthi, santo. Atthissāti kiṃ? Assatissa mā hotu.
anya-e1201n:1433: Aādo āādo ssaādo ca atthassa bhu hoti; babhuva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
anya-e1201n:1435: Ntādīsvatthissādilopo hoti; santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṃ–-etesviti kiṃ? Atthi.
anya-e1201n:1437_0: Pādīhi kriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti; saṇṭhahanto,
anya-e1201n:1437_1: santiṭṭhanto; saṇṭhahati, santiṭṭhati–-pa parā apa saṃanu ava o ni du vi adhi api
anya-e1201n:1437_2: ati su uabhipati pari upa ā pādi; kvacīti kiṃ? Saṇṭhiti.
anya-e1201n:1439: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅi henāti kvaci; anādisitvā, samādiyati; kvacītveva? Ādāya.
anya-e1201n:1440: Pādito parassakarassa kvacikha hoti; saṅkhāro, saṅkharī yati –-karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṃ timhi ca vikaraṇuppatti ñāpetuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1442: Pura iccasmā nipātā parassa karassakha hoti; purakkhatvā, purekkhāro, ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1444: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti; purakkhatvā, purekkhāro, ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1446: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti; nikkhamati; kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
anya-e1201n:1448: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅi honti sare kvavi;vediyati, bruvanti; sareti kiṃ? Nivedeti, brūti; kvacītveva? Jayati, bhavati.
anya-e1201n:1450: Ñādito’ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye; diyati; aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, tāyati.
anya-e1201n:1452: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye; tāyate, taññate.
anya-e1201n:1454: Sarantassa kriyatthassadīgho hoti kye; cīyate, sūyate. Sānantarassa tassa ṭho-.
anya-e1201n:1455: Sakārantato kriyatthā parassānantarassatakārassa ṭha hoti; kuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā, tuṭṭhabbaṃ, tuṭṭhī; ananatarasāti kiṃ? Tussitvā.
anya-e1201n:1457: Kasasmā parassānantarassa tassa ṭha hoti, kasassa vā ima ca; kiṭṭhaṃ, kaṭṭhaṃ–-anantarassātveva? Kasitabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1461: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassaṭha hoti; puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho–-anantarassātveva? Pucchitvā.
anya-e1201n:1463: Etehi parassānantarassa tassa tha hoti; satthaṃ, vutthaṃ, pasatthaṃ, satthaṃ–-kathamanusiṭṭhoti? “Kathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā“ti. Ṭho. Anantarassātveva? Sāsatuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1465: Dhakārahakārabhakārantehi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa tassa dha hoti; vuddho, duddhaṃ,laddhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1467: Dahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍha hoti; daṅḍho.
anya-e1201n:1469: Bahā parassānantarassa tassa so hoti, bahassuma ca sasantayogena; buḍḍho.
anya-e1201n:1471: Ruhādīhi parassānantarassatassa ha hoti, ḷo cāntassa; āruḷho, guḷho, vuḷho, bāḷho; anantarassātveva? Ārogatuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1473: Muhā parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti vā, ḷo cāntassa hasantiyogena; muḷho, muddho.
anya-e1201n:1474_0: Bhidādito no ktakkavantunaṃ-. Bhidādito paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassano hoti; bhinno,
anya-e1201n:1474_1: bhinnavā, chinno, chinnavā, channo, channavā, khinno, khinnavā, uppanno, uppananavā,
anya-e1201n:1474_2: sinno, sinnavā, sanenā, sannavā, pīno, pīnavā, sūno, sūnavā, dīno, dīnavā, ḍīno,
anya-e1201n:1474_3: ḍīnavā, līno, līnavā, lūno, lūnavā–-ktaktavantunatti kiṃ? Bhitti; chitti, bhottuṃ, chettuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1476: Dāto paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassa inno hoti; dinno, dinnavā.
anya-e1201n:1478: Kirādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassānantarassa ṇa hoti; kiṇṇo, kiṇṇavā, puṇṇo, puṇṇavā, khīṇo, khīṇavā.
anya-e1201n:1480: Tarādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassaraṇṇo hoti; tiṇṇo, tiṇṇavā, jiṇṇo, jiṇṇavā, ciṇṇo, ciṇṇavā.
anya-e1201n:1482: Bhañjādīhi paresaṃktaktavantunaṃ tassānantarassaga hoti; bhaggo, bhaggavā, laggo, laggavā, nimuggo, nimuggavā, saṃviggo, saṃviggavā.
anya-e1201n:1484: Susā paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassa kho hoti; sukkheṃ, sukkhavā.
anya-e1201n:1486: Pacā paresaṃ ktakkavantunaṃ tassa ko hoti; pakko, pakkavā.
anya-e1201n:1488: Mucā paresaṃktaktavantunaṃ tassa ko vā hoti; mukko, mutto; mukkavā, muttavā–-sakkoti ṇvādisu siddhaṃ–-ktaktavantusu satto sattavātveva hoti.
anya-e1201n:1490: Vaḍḍhā parassaktissa tassa lopo hoti; vaḍḍhi.
anya-e1201n:1492: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti; abhibhu.
anya-e1201n:1494: Ṇiṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesu ṇiṇāpīsu;’kārentaṃ payojayayati’kāreti, kārāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1496: Vikaraṇānaṃ kvaci lopo hota; udapādi, hanti.
anya-e1201n:1498: Kriyatthā parassa mānassa makārassa lopo hoti kvaci; karāṇo; kvacati kiṃ? Kurumāno.
anya-e1201n:1500: Eilāname hota kvacī; gahetvā, adenti; kvacītveva? Vapitvā.
anya-e1201n:1502: Tvāssavā pyo hota samāse; pakāro’pye sassā’ti. Visesanatthā; abhibhūya, abhibhavitvā–-samāseti kiṃ? Patvā; kvavāsamāse’pi bahakulādhikārā?Lataṃ dantehi chindiya.
anya-e1201n:1504: Tvāssa vā tuṃyānā honti samāse kvaci; abhihaṭhūṃ, abhiharitvā; anumodiyāna, anumoditvā–-asamāse-pi bahulādhikārā? Daṭhuṃ; disvā–-esamappavisayatāñāpanattho yogavibhāgo.
anya-e1201n:1506: Hanasmā parassa tvāssa racco vā hoti samāse; ahacca, ahanitvā.
anya-e1201n:1508: Sāsādhīhi parā karā parassa tvāssa cacariccā vā honti yathākkamaṃ; sakkacca, sakkaritvā, asakkacca, asakkaritvā, adhikicca, adhikaritvā,
anya-e1201n:1510: Iiccasmā parassa tvāssa cco vā hoti; adhicca, adhiyitvā, samecca, sametvā.
anya-e1201n:1512_0: Disato tvāssa vānavā honti vā, disassa ca sakāro taṃ santiyogena; sassa savidhānaṃ
anya-e1201n:1512_1: pararūpabādhanatthaṃ; disvāna, disvā, passitvā–-kathaṃ nādaṭṭhā parato dosanti? Ñāpakātvāssa
anya-e1201n:1514: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti; bhuñjituṃ, hottu; byañjanassāti kiṃ? Pācako.
anya-e1201n:1516: Rāntato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti; araṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1518: Rāntato paresaṃ ntamānatyādīnaṃ nassa ṇo na hoti; karonto, kurumāno; karonti.
anya-e1201n:1520_0: Etesaṃ vā cchaṅi hoti ntamānatyādisu; gacchanto, gacchamāno, gacchati; yacchanto,
anya-e1201n:1520_1: yacchamāno, yacchati; icchanto, icchamāno, icchati; acchanto, acchamāno, acchati;
anya-e1201n:1520_2: dicchanto, dicchamāno, dicchati. Vāti kiṃ? Gamissati; vavatthita vihāsattenaññesu
anya-e1201n:1520_3: ca kvaci? Icchitabbaṃ, icchā, icchituṃ; acchitabbaṃ, acchatuṃ; aññesañca yogavibhāgā? Pavecchati.
anya-e1201n:1522: Etesamīyaṅi vā hoti ntamānatyādisu; jīyanto, jīranto; jīyamāno, jīramāno; jīyati, jīrati; mīyanto, maranto; mīyamāno, maramāno; mīyati, marati.
anya-e1201n:1524: Ṭhapānaṃ tiṭṭhapivā honti vā ntamānatyādisu; tiṭṭhanto, tiṭṭhamāno, tiṭṭhati; pivanto, pivati; vātveva? Ṭhāti, pāti.
anya-e1201n:1526: Gamādīnaṃ ghammādayo vā honti ntamānatyyādisu; ghammanto, gacchanto; vajjanto, vadanto; dajjanto, dadanto.
anya-e1201n:1528_0: Karassa saokārassa kubbādayo vā honti ntamānatyādisu; kubbanto, kayiranto, karonto;
anya-e1201n:1528_1: kubbamāno, kurumāno, kayiramāno, karāṇo; kubbati, kayirati, karoti; kubbate, kurute,
anya-e1201n:1528_3: pubbacchakke? Agghaṃ kurutu no bhavaṃ; sossāti vuttattā kattari yevime.
anya-e1201n:1530: Gahassa vā gheppoti ntamānatyādisu; gheppanto, gheppamāno, gheppati–-vātveva? Gaṇhāti.
anya-e1201n:1532: Gahassa niggahatassa ṇo hoti; gaṇhitabbaṃ, gaṇhituṃ, gaṇhanto.
anya-e1201n:1533: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ khādikaṇḍo pañcamo.
anya-e1201n:1535_0: Vattamānñāraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo hontī; gacchati,
anya-e1201n:1535_1: gacchanti, gacchasi, gacchatha, gacchāmi, gacchāma; gacchate, gacchante, gacchase,
anya-e1201n:1535_2: gacchavhe, gacche, gacchamhe –-kathaṃ pure adhammo dippati, purā marāmiti? Vattamānasseva
anya-e1201n:1535_3: vattumiṭṭhattā, taṃsamīpassataggahaṇena gahaṇā; purepurāsaddehi vā anāgatattāvagamyate,
anya-e1201n:1535_4: tadā tassa vattamānattā; kālavyattayo vā eso; bhavanteva hi kālantare’pi tyādayo
anya-e1201n:1535_5: bāhulakā?“Santesu pariguhāmi mā ca kiñci ito adaṃ, kāyayassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1535_6: sahavyataṃ gacchati vāsavassa, anekajātisaṃsāraṃ sandhāvissaṃ, ativelaṃ namassissanti“.
anya-e1201n:1537_0: Bhavissati anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti; gamissati, gamissanti,
anya-e1201n:1537_1: gamissasi, gamissatha, gamissāmi, gamissāma; gamissate, gamissante, gamissase, gamissavhe,
anya-e1201n:1539_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṃ vimbhaye ca gamyamānessatyādayo honti; ime hi nāma
anya-e1201n:1539_1: kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti; na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassapāṇesu anuddayā
anya-e1201n:1539_2: bhavissati; kathañhi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karissati;
anya-e1201n:1539_3: tattha nāma tvaṃ moghapurisamayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya vetessasi, atthi
anya-e1201n:1539_4: nāmatāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi, atthiyevihāpi nindāvagamo.
anya-e1201n:1539_5: Vimbhaye?- Acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhūtaṃ vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārenaviranti,
anya-e1201n:1539_6: yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattānī sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni
anya-e1201n:1539_7: neva dakkhiti, na pana saddaṃ sossati; acchariyaṃ andho nāma pabbatamārohissati;
anya-e1201n:1541_0: Bhute parisamattñatthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti; agamī, agamuṃ, agamo,
anya-e1201n:1541_1: agamittha, agamiṃ, agamimhā; agamā, agamū, agamise, agamivhaṃ, agama, agamimhe–-bhuta
anya-e1201n:1543: Avijjamānajjatane bhute’tthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti.
anya-e1201n:1544: Āñāyyā ca uṭṭhānā āñāyyā ca saṃvesanā,
anya-e1201n:1546: Agamā, agamū, agamo, agamattha, agama, agamamhā; agamittha, agamatthuṃ, agamase, agamavhaṃ, gamiṃ, agamamhase; aññapadattho kiṃ? Ajja hiyyo vā agamāsi.
anya-e1201n:1548_0: Apaccakkhe bhutānajjatane’tthe cattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti; jagāma, jagamu,
anya-e1201n:1548_1: jagame, jagamittha, jagama, jagamimha; jagamittha, jagamire, jagamittho, jagamivho,
anya-e1201n:1549: Mūḷhavikkhittabyāsattacittonattanāpi kriyā katābhinibbattikāle’nupaladdhā samānā elenānumīyamānā parokkhāca vatthuto; tenuttamavsaye’pi payogasambhavo.
anya-e1201n:1551_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo honti vibhāsā; vidhurappaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato
anya-e1201n:1551_1: vā kriyāyāti patanamanipphatti kriyātipatti; ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyātītānāgatesveva
anya-e1201n:1551_2: honti, na vattamāne, tatra kriyātipattya sambhavā.
anya-e1201n:1552_0: Sace paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā, arahā abhavissā; dakkhiṇena ce agamissā, na
anya-e1201n:1552_1: sakaṭaṃ pariyābhavissā- dakkhiṇena ce agamissaṃsu, agamisse, agamissatha, agamissaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1552_2: agamissamhā, agamissatha, agamissiṃsu, agamissase, agamissavhe,agamissiṃ, agamissāma
anya-e1201n:1552_3: ase- na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhavissā. Vāti kiṃ? Dakkhiṇena ce gamissati, na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhavissati.
anya-e1201n:1554: Hetubhutāyaṃ phalabhutāyañca kriyāyaṃ vattamānato kriyatthāeyyādayo vā honti.
anya-e1201n:1555_0: Sace saṃkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṃ, na nirujjheyyuṃ; dakkhineṇana ce gaccheyya, na sakaṭaṃ
anya-e1201n:1555_1: pariyābhaveyya-dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyyuṃ, gaccheyyāsi, gaccheyyātha, gaccheyyāmi,
anya-e1201n:1555_2: gaccheyayyāma; gacchetha, gaccheraṃ, gacchetho, gaccheyyavho, gaccheyyaṃ, gaccheyyāmhe-
anya-e1201n:1555_3: na sakaṭaṃ pariyābhaveyya; bhavanaṃ gamanañca hetu, anirujjhanaṃ pariyābhavanañca
anya-e1201n:1555_4: phalaṃ–-iha kasmā na hoti?- Hantīti palāyati, vassatīti dhāvati, hanissatīti palāyissatīti?
anya-e1201n:1555_5: Itisaddeneva hetuhetumantatāyaya jotitattā vāti kiṃ dakkhiṇena ce gamissati, na sakaṭaṃ pariyā bhavissati.
anya-e1201n:1557_1: vidhānaṃ vidhi niyojanaṃ kriyāsu vyāpāraṇā; sā ca duvidhāva?- Sādarānādaravasena,
anya-e1201n:1558_0: Etesu pañhādisu kriyatthato eyyādayo honti; pañhe?-Kimāyasmā vinayampariyāpuṇeyya,udāhu
anya-e1201n:1558_1: dhammaṃ?; Gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ uposathaṃ, na vā gaccheyyaṃ?, Patthanāyaṃ?- Labheyyāhakakambhante
anya-e1201n:1558_2: bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ; passeyyaṃ taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1558_3: Vidhimhi?-Bhavaṃ pattaṃ paceyya, bhavaṃ puññaṃ kareyya, iha bhavaṃ bhuñjeyya, iha
anya-e1201n:1558_4: bhavaṃ nisīdeyya, māṇavakaṃ bhavaṃ ajjhāpeyya–-anuññāpattakālesupi siddhāva, tatthāpi
anya-e1201n:1558_5: vidhippatītito; anuññāyaṃ?Evaṃkareyyāsi. Pattakāle?- Kaṭaṃ kareyyāsi, patto te kālo
anya-e1201n:1558_6: kaṭakaraṇe; yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya; etassa bhagavā kālo,
anya-e1201n:1558_7: etassa sugata kālo, yambhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya–-pesane’picchanti?-
anya-e1201n:1560_0: Pañhādisvete honti kriyatthato; kriyatthato; yacchatu, gacchantu, gacchāhi, gacchatha,
anya-e1201n:1560_1: gacchāmi, gacchāma, gacchataṃ, gacchantaṃ, gacchassu, gacchavho, gacche, gacchāmase–-pañhe?-
anya-e1201n:1560_2: Kinnu balu ho vyākaraṇamadhiyassu?. Patthanāyaṃ?- Dadāhi me, jivatu bhavaṃ. Visimhi?-Kaṭaṃ
anya-e1201n:1560_3: karotu bhavaṃ, puññaṃ karotu bhavaṃ, iha bhavaṃ bhuñjatu, ihabhavaṃ nisīdatu, uddisatu
anya-e1201n:1560_4: bhante bhagavā pātimokkhā. Pesane?- Gaccha bhaṇe gāmaṃ. Anumatiyaṃ?Evaṃ karohi. Pattakāle?-Kālo’yaṃ
anya-e1201n:1562: Sattiyaṃ arahatthe ca kriyatthā. Eyyādayo honti; bhavaṃ khalu rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ satto; arabho.
anya-e1201n:1564_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayohonti vibhāsā; api pabbataṃ sirasā
anya-e1201n:1564_1: bhindeyya. Kriyātipattiyantussādi?- Asaniyāpi hato nāpatissā sambhāvemi saddahāmiavakappemi
anya-e1201n:1564_2: bhuñjeyya bhavaṃ; bhujissati bhavaṃ, abhuñji bhavaṃ. Krayātipattiyantussādi-sambhāvemi nābhujissaṃ bhavaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1566_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti; māssupunapi evarūpamakāsi, mā bhavaṃ agamā
anya-e1201n:1566_1: vanaṃ; vāti kiṃ? Mā tekāmaguṇe bhamassu cittaṃ, mā tvaṃ karissasi, mā tvaṃ kareyyāsi–-asakakālattho’yamārambho;
anya-e1201n:1566_2: buddho’bhavissatīti padantara sambandhena anāgatakālatā patiyate, evaṃ kato kaṭo
anya-e1201n:1566_3: svebhavissati, bhāvi kaccamāsīti; lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ lunāti, lunassu lunassutvevāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1566_4: lunātīti tvādīnamevetaṃ majjhimapuri sekavacanānamābhikkhaññe vibbavanaṃ; idaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e1201n:1566_5: hoti?-Evamesa turito aññe’pi niyojento viya kiriyaṃ karotīti; evaṃ lunātha lunāthātvevāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1566_6: lunāti, lunavho lunavho tvevāyaṃ lunāti; tathā kālattaresupi lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ
anya-e1201n:1566_7: aluni, alunā, lulāva, lunissatīti; evaṃ ssumhi ca yojanīyaṃ–-tathā samuccaye’pi maṭhamaṭa,
anya-e1201n:1566_9: sāmaññavacanasseva byāpakattā anuppayogo bhavati? Odanaṃ bhuñja, yāgumpiva, dhānā
anya-e1201n:1568_1: paracchakkānaṃ majjhimuttamapaṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṃ kriyatthā; uttamasaddo’yaṃ
anya-e1201n:1568_2: sabhāvato tatiyaduke ruḷho–-tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, tvaṃ gacchase, tumhe
anya-e1201n:1568_3: gacchavhe; tvaṃgacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, tvaṃ gacchase, tumhe gacchavhe; ahaṃgacchāmi,
anya-e1201n:1568_4: mayaṃ gacchāma,ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmhe; so gacchati, te gacchanti, so gacchate, te gacchante.
anya-e1201n:1569_0: Sāmatthiyā laddhantā appaṭhujjamānesupi tumhāmhasesesu bhavanti–-gacchasī, gacchatha,
anya-e1201n:1569_1: gacchase, gacchavhe; gacchāmi, gacchāma, gacche, gacchāmhe; gacchati,gacchanti, gacchate, gacchante.
anya-e1201n:1571: Āādo īādo ssāādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hoti, ñakāro’nubandho–-agamā, gamā; agamī, gamī; agamissā, gamissā.
anya-e1201n:1572: Aādisvāho brūssa-. Brūssa āho hoti aādisu; āha, āhu.
anya-e1201n:1574: Aādisu bhussa cuka hoti; kakāro’nubandho; ukāro uccāraṇattho; babhuva.
anya-e1201n:1576: Aādisu dvitte pubbassa bhussaa hoti; babhuva.
anya-e1201n:1580: Āhā paresaṃ tiantīnaṃ ṭaṭū honti; ṭakārā sabbādesatthā; āha, āhu. Atoyeva ca ñāpakā tiantisu ca brūssāho.
anya-e1201n:1582: Īādisuvacassa oma hoti; makāro’nubandhā; avoca; īādoti kiṃ? Avaca.
anya-e1201n:1584: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṃ vā hoti mimesu; dammi,demi; damma, dema. Añcitteti kiṃ? Dadāmi. Dadāma.
anya-e1201n:1586: Karassa saokārassa kuṃ vā hoti mimesu; kummi, kumma; karomi, karoma.
anya-e1201n:1588: Karassa saokārassakā hoti vā īādisu; akāsi, akari; akaṃsu, akariṃsu; akā, akarā.
anya-e1201n:1590: Karassasossahāssaca āhaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; kāhati, karissati; akāhā, akarissā;hāhatī, hāyissati; āhāhā, ahāyissā.
anya-e1201n:1592_0: Labhādīnaṃ cchaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; alacchā, alabhissā, lacchati, labhissati; avacchā,
anya-e1201n:1592_1: avasissā; vacchati, vasissati; cchecchā, acchindissā; checchati. Chindissati; hecchā,
anya-e1201n:1592_2: bhindissā; bhecchati,bhindissati; arucchā, arodissā; rucchati, rodissati. Aññasmimpi
anya-e1201n:1592_3: chidassa vā cchaṅi yogavibhāgā?- Acchecchuṃ, acchindiṃsu. Aññesaṃ va?-Gacchaṃ, gacchissaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1594_0: Bhujādīnaṃ kkhaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; abhokkhā, abhuñjissā; bhokkhati, bhujissati;
anya-e1201n:1594_1: amokkhā, amuñcissā; mokkhatiṃ muñcissati; acakkhā, avacissā; cakkhati. Vacissati;
anya-e1201n:1594_2: pāvekkhā, pāvisissā; pavekkhati, pavisissati. Visassāññasmimpi vā kkhaṅi yogavibhāgā?-Pāvekkhi, pāvisi.
anya-e1201n:1596: Āādoīādo ca harassaā hoticā; ahā, aharā; abhāsi, abhari.
anya-e1201n:1598: Āādoīādo ca gamissā hoti vā; agā, agamā; agā,agami. Saṃsassa ca chaṅi-.
anya-e1201n:1599: Saṃsassa ca gamissa ca chaṅi vā hoti āīādisu; aḍañchā, aḍaṃsā; aḍañchi,aḍaṃsi; agañchā, agacchā, agañchi, agacchi.
anya-e1201n:1601: Hūssa hñādayo honti ssaccādo; hessati, hehissati, hohissati.
anya-e1201n:1605: Esaṃ vā rasso hoti; gama, gamā; gami, gamī; gamu; gamimha, gamimhā; gamissa, gamissā; gamissamha, gamissamhā.
anya-e1201n:1607: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti; akkocchi, akkosi; abhirucchi, abhiruhi.
anya-e1201n:1609_0: Kriyatthā paresaṃ aādīnaṃ īādinaṃ ssaādīnava byañjanassैña hoti vibhāsā; babhuvittha,abhavittha,
anya-e1201n:1609_1: abhavissā, anubhavissā, anubhavissati, anubhossati, (harissati) hassati. Etesanti
anya-e1201n:1611: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti; bravīti, brūti.
anya-e1201n:1613: Kriyatthā parassakyassa īñvā hoti; pacīyati paccati.
anya-e1201n:1615_0: Eyyāthādīnaṃ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṃ; tumhe bhaveyyātho, bhaveyyātha; tvaṃ abhavissa,
anya-e1201n:1615_1: abhavisse; ahaṃ abhavaṃ, abhava; so abhavittha, abhavā; so abhavittho, abhavī; tumhe
anya-e1201n:1615_2: bhavathavho, bhavatha–-āsahavaritova akāro gayhate–-tho panante niddesā tvādisambandhīyeva,
anya-e1201n:1615_3: tasseva vā nissītattā; nissayayakaraṇampi hi suttakārāviṇṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1617: Umiccassa iṃsuaṃsu vā honti; agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1619: Ñādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṃ vā hoti; nesuṃ, nayiṃsu; assosuṃ, assuṃ–-ādesattākhyā panatthaṃ ttaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1621: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṃ vā hoti; ahesuṃ, ahavuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1623: Ossa aādayo vā honti; tvaṃ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho, abhavo.
anya-e1201n:1625: Ossa si vā hoti; ahosi tvaṃ ahuvo.
anya-e1201n:1627: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti; akāsi, akā; adāsi, adā.
anya-e1201n:1629: Mhātthānamuñdvā hoti; agamumhā, agamimhā; agamuttha, agamittha.
anya-e1201n:1631: Imiccassa siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ; akāsiṃ, akariṃ; aakāsimhā, akarimhā;akāsittha, akarittha.
anya-e1201n:1633: Eyyumiccassa uṃ vā hoti; gacchuṃ, gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1635: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti; gaccha, gacchāhi–-atoti kiṃ? Karohi.
anya-e1201n:1637: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse; andhabhavissā, anvabhuyissā, anubhavissati, anubhuyissati.
anya-e1201n:1639: Asa-bhuvīccasmā paresaṃeyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ; assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṃ, assāma.
anya-e1201n:1641: Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ iyāisuṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; siyā, siyuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1643: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti; attha, atthu.
anya-e1201n:1645: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu; ṭo sabbādesattho; asi, ahi.
anya-e1201n:1647: Atthismā paresaṃ mimānaṃ mhimhā vā honti, taṃsantiyo gena tthissa aṭa ca; amhi,asmi; amha, asma.
anya-e1201n:1649: Esu mimesuatthissa sakāro hoti; asmi, asma; pararūpabādhanatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1651: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi; āsi, āsuṃ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṃ, āsimhā.
anya-e1201n:1652: Himimesvassa-. Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu; pavāhi, pavāmi, pavāma; muyhāmi.
anya-e1201n:1654: Sakasmā kaṇāssa kho hoti ī ādisu; asakkhi, asakkhiṃsu.
anya-e1201n:1656: Sakasmā kaṇāssa kho vā bhoti sse; sakkhissā, sakkuṇissā; sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
anya-e1201n:1658: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṃ keṇākaṇānaṃ roṭa hoti; assosi, asuṇi; assossā, asuṇissā; sossati, suṇissati.
anya-e1201n:1660: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi; nāyati. Jānāti.
anya-e1201n:1662: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ vā hoti; jaññā, jāneyya.
anya-e1201n:1664: Ñāto eyyassa iyāñā honti vā; jāniyā, jaññā, jāneyya.
anya-e1201n:1666: Īādo ssaccādo ca ñāto kanā lopo vā hoti; aññasi, ajāni; ñassati, jānissati.
anya-e1201n:1668: Ñāto parassassassa hi vā hoti kamme; paññāyihiti, paññāyissatī,
anya-e1201n:1670: Etismā parassassassahi hoti vā; ehiti, essati.
anya-e1201n:1672: Hanā ssassa chekhā vā honti; hañchema, hanissāma; paṭihaṃkhāmi, paṭihanissāmi.
anya-e1201n:1674: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā; hāhati, chahissati.
anya-e1201n:1676: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassassassa lopo vā hoti; dakkhati. Dakkhissati; sakkhati, sakkhissati; hehiti, hehissati; hohiti, hohissati.
anya-e1201n:1678: Kayirā parasseyyumādīnameyyassa lopo hoti; kayiruṃ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e1201n:1684: Labhasmā iṃīiccesaṃ thaṃthā honti vā; alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ; alattha, alabhi.
anya-e1201n:1686_0: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṃ ntentīnaṃ re vā hoti; gacchare, gacchanti; gacchare, gacchante;
anya-e1201n:1686_1: gamissare, gamissanti; gamissare, gamissante–-gurupubbāti kiṃ? Pacanti. Rassāti kiṃ? Honti
anya-e1201n:1688: Eyyādīnaṃ ṭe vā hoti; so kare, so kareyya; tvaṃ, kare, tvaṃ kareyyāsi; ahaṃ kare, ahaṃ kareyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1692: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke; vanuti, vanoti.
anya-e1201n:1694: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti, u ca; bhavemu, bhaveyyāmu, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e1201n:1695: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ tyādikaṇḍo chaṭṭho.
